name: Parure Gold 24K Radiance Primer
about: What it is:This lightweight, gel primer infused with pure 24 Karat gold flakes infuses the skin with hydration and radiance while allowing for a longer-lasting makeup result..Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens..What Else You Need to Know:This luxurious and hydrating gel primer seamlessly melts into the skin to provide a more even and long-lasting finish under makeup, to smooth the appearance of fine lines, and to tighten skin.
ingredients: -24K Gold: Illuminates skin with a youthful glow...Aqua (Water) , Alcohol , Glycerin , Butylene Glycol , Polyglycerin-3 , Sorbitol ,  Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide , Hydroxyacetophenone , Chlorphenesin , Betaine , Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate , Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate , Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer , Carbomer , Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer , Parfum (Fragrance) , Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice , Polyvinyl Alcohol , Maltodextrin , Sodium Hyaluronate , Cellulose Gum , Gold ,  Sodium Hydroxide , Prunus Cerasus (Bitter Cherry) Flower Extract , Lactobacillus.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Take a small amount of gel on the back of your hand, and gently apply to your face, working outward to even out creases and smooth the look of lines. .-Wait a few seconds before applying foundation..-The secret of absolute radiance: Mix a few drops of fluid foundation and Lu2019Or in the palm of your hand for an incredibly-light texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was on the hunt for a good primer and came across this one by Guerlain. While it does come with an above average price tag, it was so worth the smoothness it provided for my makeup. My skin is often dull and in need of a moisturizer look - this primer helped to achieve just that! There was a nice glowy finish to it. Highly recommended to those who need a nice glowy finish to their daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was my own purchase and not given to me by anyone. My skin is fair, sensitive, and prone to dryness and as I creep up on 50, has quite a few fine lines.  I first fell in love with this primer during a trip to Sephora.  A Guerlain sales associate had me try it (along with the Advanced Youth Watery oil which is lovely), and I was on the fence about buying it due to the hefty price tag.  Several months later, I decided to treat myself and ordered the serum. Great decision!  First, I love the packaging and the look of the serum itself.  It's one of the few products I like to leave out on display due to its prettiness factor. It looks so glamorous on the vanity table!  The smell is light and very delicate,  It's a bit more perfumy than any other primer I have tried before but I don't mind it. The product pumps out very nicely and a little seems to go a long way. When I first put it on, it felt thick and sticky but it quickly dried to a nice finish that I could work with.  My makeup up went on seamlessly and stayed looking beautiful all day.  I also like that I can wear it alone and it gives my skin a luminous dewy glow that has long since been lost! I would recommend this lovely Guerlain product.

I just bought another bottle and although that did hurt my wallet a bit, I KNOW I'm getting a really good product. It kind of sucks that it does not last longer .... but you only need 1 pump. I think this is going to be the primer I stick with! `

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Guerlain makeup primer and was blown away by its luxurious feel and stunning appearance. The packaging and bottle look sleek and high-end, while the gold flecks floating inside add an extra touch of beauty. Even the product itself is gorgeous to look at!  The primer has a gentle scent that makes the application process feel even more glamorous. What I loved most about it is the texture - it's incredibly smooth and non-sticky, which makes it easy to apply and blend seamlessly with a damp beauty sponge. It creates a perfect base for foundation, providing a flawless canvas for my makeup.  I used this primer with the Guerlain Terracotta Le Teint Fluid Foundation, and they paired together perfectly. The primer helped me achieve a smooth and uniform finish on my skin, and it extended the wear time of the foundation, which normally doesn't last me all day. With this primer, my foundation looked great from morning until evening, without any noticeable wear and tear.  I've used other Guerlain products before, and I'm always impressed by their quality. This primer is no exception - I would definitely recommend it to others and even repurchase it myself. It's worth noting that I received this primer from Influenster for free in exchange for my honest review, but my positive experience shows that it's a product worth investing in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was recently sent the Guerlain Parure Gold 24K Primer in exchange for my honest review and unfortunately, it did not live up to my expectations. Firstly, the consistency of the product was quite thin and wet, which made it difficult to apply evenly on my skin. Additionally, there were unnecessary gold flakes suspended throughout the primer, which did not serve any functional purpose and felt gimmicky.  Furthermore, the primer did nothing to improve the appearance or texture of my skin. It did not blur my pores or smooth out my complexion, and it did not make my foundation last longer. In fact, I found that my makeup actually looked worse when I used this primer.  To make matters worse, the scent of the product was unpleasant. It smelled like a combination of hand sanitizer and Guerlain perfume, which was overwhelming and unpleasant to me.  Overall, I would give the Guerlain Parure Gold 24K Primer a 2 out of 5 stars. The thin, wet consistency, unnecessary gold flakes, and lack of efficacy left me disappointed. Additionally, the unpleasant scent made it a product that I would not want to use again.

reviews.review_title: Wish it worked for my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was gifted this Guerlain primer from influenster in exchange for a honest review. The bottle is gorgeous! Looks all those gold flakes flowing looks so glamorous and luxurious. The pump works smoothly distributing just the right amount of product.   I have combination skin, oily in the T-zone but dry everywhere else. I applied this over my usual skincare routine. Goes on smoothly, it has a bit of sticky feel at first but it goes away once it is fully absorb. The smaller gold flakes absorbed right into the skin, but the bigger ones just sat on top on the skin. Kinda looked weird to have a few random gold flakes on my face.   After application I noticed my skin feels more hydrated, looks plumper, smoother, more even and radiant. Saids you can wear it alone with or without makeup. I liked this on my skin without make up, gave me a healthy natural glow. But it didn't do much for me as a primer, didn't help with my pores or fine lines when my makeup was applied. I tired it with my usual liquid foundation, and tired it with the new Guerlain Terracotta Le Teint - Healthy Glow Natural Perfection Foundation, which was also gifted. Both foundation when on smooth at first but as I worked it in with my beautyblender, it dried and cling on to my fine lines, wrinkles, pores and dry skin. It might be because there is no silicone/dimethicone in this primer? My make up did stay on all day and didn't transfer. However I think this would work better as a primer for people who do not have problematic skin. I prefer primer which help blur out my imperfections.   This primer has a strong honey/floral fragrance that stays on even after application. It is too overwhelming for my liking. I do however love that this has 98% naturally derived ingredients and paraben free. I would still use this on non makeup days for extra boost of hydration and radiance, but not as a primer. I would recommend this if your concerns are hydration and radiance and you do not have sensitivity to scent.

reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest feedback. Letu2019s state the obvious first: this stuff feels bougie AF. The bottle is beautifully designed and has a really lovely weight to it. The product feels nice and I definitely did notice my foundation wore longer when I had this on. For reference my skin is dehydrated, which means that even though itu2019s super dry it also gets quite oily. One thing to keep in mind is that this primer is quite fragranced. It does go away, but if your skin is sensitive to fragrance it might not be the best choice for you. Now for the u201cwomp wompu201d news:  yes it made my foundation last longer, but my super inexpensive elf primer performed just as well. The takeaway: if you want something bougie to feel luxurious every so often, or if it is worth it to have the Guerlain primer, absolutely you do you!! If you prefer to save a little Iu2019d say spend on the Guerlain foundation and buy a drugstore primer to go with it. Thereu2019s definitely no denying that this one is beautiful!

The texture is like a serum and when applied leaves skin feeling soft, mildly tacky but not quite like a gripping primer as say elf power grip. The texture is nice and it gave my skin a little glow, without looking oily. My makeup lasted just as long as it would with other primers that are far less expensive. It's more of an experience so if you have the coins to splurge this would be a great option. As nice as it is there are less expensive options that do the job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is easily one of the most luxurious ones I have every tried. It leave my skin with a beautiful glow, isnu2019t sticky, and is a great base for any foundation. The only negative I have is that it is very heavily scented, but something I can look past for an otherwise great primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Flawless dewy goodness ! Thats what this makes my skin look like. A little goes a long way and it leaves your skin feeling dewy and moisturized without being tacky and grosse. I highly recommend this primer. Feels great looks great and works great.

reviews.review_title: Gold flakes show as random flakes on face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Incentivized. The gold flakes just end up as random chunks of glitter on your face. I wish they broke up more to become an even shimmer. Overall, itu2019s a great primer, held my make up in place, not too sticky or slippery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Influenster for gifting me this primer. This is a great lightweight primer! I love the cooling feeling after popping it in the fridge. I give it 2 minutes to set after applying and it feels tacky ready for foundation application! This is a great luxurious primer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster to try out. First of all the bottle is gorgeous and looks so luxe if staying out on a vanity. However, Iu2019m not sure how I feel about the gold flecks. I applied the primer and noticed I had tons of gold flecks/sparkles all over my face. I started to panic because it wasnu2019t like a glowy look, it was straight sparkle. The texture of the actual primer was very pleasant. It seemed a little silicone like but nothing heavy like a pore filling primer. It was a touch hydrating as well. It spread evenly on my face. Once I applied the foundation you no longer could see the gold flecks which I enjoyed. I wouldnu2019t have used it again if you could. I applied my foundation with a beauty blender and it went on well until I got to my neck. I noticed the product caused a little bit of piling on my skin. If you just dab with a blender you should be fine, but it might give you problems otherwise. I had paired it with a foundation from the same brand so I would expect it to mesh together well. So at the end of the day this wasnu2019t my favourite primer but it also wasnu2019t bad. It could be someoneu2019s favourite but I canu2019t say I would purchase again. #freeproduct

reviews.review_title: A perfect base for any foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I will start this reveiw by stating I was sent this product to try for free from influenster but all thoughts and opinions are my own.  They seem to have changed the packaging a bit on this product but Iu2019ve been using this primer since 2017 and have always loved it. It gives the skin a nice hydrated but slightly sticky base to allow for beautiful foundation application and I always find my foundation looks beautiful when wearing it. It does have a strong perfume smell so if you are not a fan of scents or they affect you I would stay away from this primer however if that dosent bother you I highly recommend it and think itu2019s worth the price tag a little goes a long way. This is the 3rd bottle and I know Iu2019ll be using this primer on a regular basis and prob keep repurchasing it because it just makes my foundation look so flawless radiant and glowy. I have sensetive to dry skin and this did not cause Me any issues or breakouts and I know I will always recommend this to family and friends

reviews.review_title: A primer that feels like a serum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product from Influenster and Guerlain as an incentive for my honest review* This primer is very light and feels like a hydrating serum. Its not sticky and absorbs pretty quickly, I would wear it alone for a fresh glowy natural look. Goes well under the foundation and over sunscreen, it doesnu2019t ball up. The big plus for me is that it doesnu2019t have that typical primer silicone feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Letu2019s start with the positive, the packaging is beautiful and feels luxurious. Itu2019s sleek and is made of heavy glass. The pump is nice and neat.  The product is completely filled with suspended gold flecks, no need to shake its evenly distributed. The product is thin and easily absorbed by the skin leaving the skin feeling hydrated on my dry to combo skin, the gold flecks brush off, they do not melt or get absorbed by the skin. The foundation did sit well on top of it.  Unfortunately I couldnu2019t do a wear test as itu2019s heavily scented and Iu2019m allergic to most fragrances and if definitely triggered my allergies.

reviews.review_title: Love the feeling on my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The package is beautiful. And the pump very useful. I love the way it makes my skin feels. Also helps my foundation look better. I have combinations skin and my skin was not dry for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the feeling of this on my skin. It was light and felt moisturizing. It also gripped into the foundation to hold it in place . The scent is fairly strong but I enjoyed the smell of it. It did not leave my skin feeling sticky which is a big must for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the 24k gold is not really needed but adds extra factor on this primer! It helped my foundation holds well throughout the day! It also smelled amazing.

It's nice, but a little overpowering for it being a primer. I do feel like you get lots of product for the price.  I will continue to add this to my pre-makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I received this product as incentive from influenster and Guerlain for my honest review. Packaging and product look beautiful and the primer is very nice smelling. I am oily/normal skin type, thatu2019s why I didnu2019t give a 5 star because it feels a little sticky after applying, but it doesnu2019t leave my skin looking shiny throughout the day which is great. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  First of all this packaging is gorgeous! What a lux product.   I have dry and sensitive skin and even with it being fragranced it didnu2019t irritate my skin.   I used 2 pumps and it fully covered my face and left a luminous, plump and hydrated appearance to my skin.   It held my foundation in place all day and didnu2019t have to reply any makeup.   I did use it with the Guerlain Terracotta Le Teint Fluid Foundation at first but didnu2019t like the way that foundation looked on my skin. After using this primer with other foundations I did love the results and how it make my skin look and feel.  The little gold flakes add a luminous glow to the skin and the formula is super soothing on my dry and sensitive skin. I would say it suitable for most skin types.   I will continue using this primer and am super happy with this product.

reviews.review_title: ok primer, but thin and sticky
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t too sure how to best use Lu2019Or Gold Radiance; usually I like to use a blurring silicone primer under my mineral powder foundation, but the consistency of this primer is very thin. Someone else compared it to gel hand sanitizer, that would be accurate. The gold flecks disappear on contact, so I didnu2019t notice any residue from those. The main thing I observed with this primer is that itu2019s very sticky and takes a long time to dry. Longer than a silicone primer. I got fed up of waiting after a while and ended up applying Charlotte Tilbury Magic Cream on top as my makeup base. My skin looked great once I applied my powder foundation, nice and plump. I repeated the same process with La Mer SPF50 sunscreen on top, also works nicely without pilling. To me it behaves more like a skincare serum than an actual primer. I will finish the deluxe mini I got in my Sephora Luxe box, but I will stick to my beloved Murad Invisiblur Perfecting Shield SPF30 primer. Lu2019Or Gold Radiance is not transformative enough for me to make the switch, and the price is a little obscene for what you get. JMHO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: hate that i love this so muchu2026

reviews.review_text: iu2019ve tried so many primers in my life and most would just make my makeup slid off cuz i have such oily skinu2026 but this one, you guys, LIFE CHANGING. i am not a boujee btch by any means but this is well worth the splurge. i get compliments on my skin every time i use this with the estee launder DW. i never ever got compliments on my skin before thisu2026. my skin kind of sucks but you would NEVER know while iu2019m wearing this. holy grail for us super oily girls

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: apply directly to your face or it will absorb into your hands, It has the consistency of an antibacterial gel but with gold particles, in addition to the aroma of alcohol, my skin is dry and I am surprised that it does not dry out so much for the amount of alcohol it contains, it is not one of my favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Boy did this improved the look & longevity of my foundation! I have very oily skin, like crisco oily with large pores, & live in humid Florida. Since itu2019s a water base primer I used a water base foundation ( Estu00e9e Lauder DW) followed by LM setting powder & NYX setting spray and my foundation went on so smooth with no dry patches or textured skin, most of my pores were covered and my largest pores on my cheeks were noticeably smaller (no primer can make large pores disappear completely). Itu2019s also great at keeping oil at bay. I usually get oily 30min-1hr after applying makeup & go through 7-8 sheets of blotting paper a day, 1 sheet per hour. This primer held back my oils for at least 4hrs after application, & even then I looked more glowy then greasy, which is a huge improvement for me & I no longer feel so self conscious about my oily skin. Now I only blot once or twice a day and my foundation stays put and looks ridiculously fresh. I also wear glasses & noticed tht my foundation doesnu2019t shift or disappear anymore! I would say it performs similarly to the milk makeup primer, just with a more watery consistency like hand sanitizer lol, but it has that grip & I have to admit the end result is just a little better than the Milk primer. That being said you can go for the more affordable option cause this is pretty expensive. But if your curious & have skin like me, definitely get your hands on a sample. If you like the finish & can afford to splurge, go for it! I DO NOT regret buying this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this when I ordered some lipstick from Sephora online and I tried it and this primer is so much better then my current primer I use and other primers then I used in the past from other big brands. Itu2019s very expensive but I really want more of this primer. I just loved the way it made my make up look. I just wish it wasnu2019t so expensive.

reviews.review_title: MUST buy with lingerie de peau foundation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so I tried this on half my face with my foundation&the other half without this primer & only foundation & it definitely makes a difference! your foundation adheres better to your skin, enhancing a more natural, flawless, airbrushed look that gives your skin a glow, makes it look hydrated without looking greasy. I was apprehensive because I saw it contained alcohol & am not a huge fan of alcohol based products on your face as it can be extremely drying, but to my surprise it is now a MUST with foundation! It almost feels like hand sanitizer going on your face, but it really works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So great for a nice dewy look! I wear a medium coverage foundation so it doesnu2019t full out the gold and my makeup looks so young and dewy with this primer. Because of the steep price tag I wonu2019t use this daily but itu2019s super nice for a fancy look every once in a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too bad, I bought the full bottle and this product is not for me. It makes my skin shinny and even oily in T zone. The smell is okey but I did not feel any tighten effect. After this primer, I need to use Guerlain Blurring Active Primer on T zone before any foundations. After a week of trying, no breakouts yet (keep my fingers crossed). I will and look for another face primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to primer! I honestly haven't found a primer to replace this primer because it lays down so easily and any foundation I put on top of it looks beautiful. My skin looks great because of it and I will not change because of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a cute little sample size of this product. I used it as a primer all over my face and applied my daily make up as usual. A few hours after I noticed a fine bumpy rash all over my face. This was the only different product that I used during my routine so I know it was this product. Maybe itu2019s the gold. To my fellow sensitive skin pals do yourself a favor and take a pass on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. I got this as a sample and have purchased the full size. My skin looks so fresh when i use this. If i'm really tan i put this on with bronzer and I've used it under foundation, as well. It looks amazing both ways. I dont know if there is a super shiny glow like on the model, but the best way to describe the look is fresh. Its amazing. No issues either with dryness or breakouts, considering the alcohol in the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes your face look radiant immediately. You can wear it alone without foundation in a pinch. But it also makes foundation apply so much better! IN LOVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yep, the ingredients suck. But it came in my Luxe box and I tried it. My skin turned super dry since my 3rd kid and nothing has allowed me to wear foundation. I've tried so many foundations,  moisturizers,  serums and primers in the last two years and and still can't find something that will allow me to wear foundation without cracks, picks, flakes and peels on the sides of my nose and around my mouth. Looks so bad, Ive started to think I should just quit trying. Lo and behold, enter this baby and my Tom Ford foundation looked perfect in 90 secs. So I tried again. Yep...another fast and perfect application.  So I tried my Lancome, my Tarte, my Clinique, my Nars, my Urban Decay, my Make Up For Ever and my Laura Mercier foundations to make sure it wasn't a high end fluke. Fast perfection with every last one. So if you are struggling with foundation application due to dry, flaky, cracky skin try a sample!! I'll happily pay for this overpriced, pretty, alcohol primer to not have to go through what I've been dealing with for the last 2+ years. FYI, I'm 41 years old.

reviews.review_title: Iu2019ve tried them all - this is IT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this out in a sample and fell in love and then bought the full size! I have combo-ish skin, mid-30s, my skin could have dry patches on my cheeks but then super oily on my nose and forehead come warmer weather... Iu2019ve tried so many primers, and most felt like they did nothing, or added a layer of something on my skin... this primer doesnu2019t feel like anything on your skin, but my foundation goes on perfectly and stays on. Love this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample, and I ALWAYS look up the ingredients/reviews before a product even touches my face. Third ingredient is alcohol, so this goes straight into the trash. Ladies, if youu2019re not aware, alcohol (ethanol, isopropyl, alc denat, methanol) may *feel* okay in short term, but long term will wear down your natural moisture barrier, and can cause breakouts because of this, because it dries your skin out which creates overactive oil production (ie, your face is trying to recover). It also can accelerate the aging process, so you will get wrinkles faster! This primer is straight a JOKE for saying itu2019s hydrating, because long term it causes damage. If you bought this, stop using it. Please PLEASE look at your skincare ingredients list, there are so many primers that are a fraction of the price and will actually benefit you long term. Stay safe xx

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Straight up rubbing alcohol on your face. It just looks pretty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and used it a few days in a row to see if there was a difference. I loved the way my foundation looked with this primer but I felt no tightening effect at all like it says it is supposed to do but my makeup did last longer throughout the day. I still don't think it is worth the price though either way. maybe if I was an influencer or someone constantly on camera or in public then I'd buy it but I'm just your average joe haha. Also, I have no idea where people are getting the smell of alcohol from because it doesn't smell like anything. I don't recommend it only for the price. But if you wear makeup a lot then I'd say yes to getting it because you'd make good use of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Here's the thing about this product- it's beautiful, it's hydrating, a little goes a long way, and gives my skin a glow that radiates through my more full coverage foundations. In my opinion, it does live up to all its claims. But is it worth the money at the end of the day? Honestly hard to say. As someone with combination skin it's too hydrating in the summer for me but as a winter product, I could see myself making an impulse repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't love it or hate it. It's very luxurious looking - it looks pretty in the bottle, but unfortunately that's where it ends. First thing that turned me off was the strong alcohol smell. If I'm paying $70 for a bottle, I don't like to see the third ingredient be alcohol. If you have sensitive skin I wouldn't recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s literally water, glycerin and alcohol with gold sprinkles in. It does absolutely nothing to improve skin or the wear of makeup. Iu2019m honestly floored they charge that much for what this is. I got a small 10ml bottle sample that I used straight for 2-3 weeks just to try it out... itu2019s literally as if nothing is there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: there are so many primers out there for less money, that perform better and will not dry out your moisture barrier! Calling this Hydratingis a bit of a sick joke really LOL this may feel nice short term but long term that alcohol content is bad for all skin types. it's basically hand sanitizer with glycerin and gold flakes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this primer for years and am mad I got hooked because of the price tag. But I will say it does last a good while and it sits pretty and elegant. I have oily skin and this perfectly neutralizes my face providing a wonderful base like no other. I love that itu2019s light, it doesnu2019t feel like an additional layer. And it just feels utterly opulent. If youu2019re willing to throw down a bit of $$$ I think youu2019ll get your moneyu2019s worth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample. One of the first ingredients is alcohol. I certainly donu2019t need that on my skin. When I put it on it burned a little bit and the alcohol smell was definitely strong. My skin did not look or feel like I had a primer type product on. Just gel with alcohol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: An overhyped product and not as moisturizing as I'd hoped it'd be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure I get the hype. Most of the positive reviews I've seen are those who have oily, acne prone skin. I have dry, acne at times, skin. I had better longevity with my water based foundation (chanel Les Beiges Water Fresh Tint) directly over my moisturizer than I did on top of this. Secondly, my very light, water based foundation seemed to be more drawn to my wrinkles and called out every imperfection in my skin. It could be my skin care routine prior to application, but obviously, why change an entire routine for a primer.   On dry prone skin, I would consider this to be drying, especially given the 3rd ingredient is alcohol. Not, that IMHO, there is anything wrong with alcohol, but defeats my normal dewy skin approach.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only primer Iu2019ve ever used that has made such a noticeable difference! Itu2019s worth the high price, especially considering you only need a drop or two. This bottle will last a long time. This primer prevents me from having an oily greasy face for over 12hrs, and I normally have noticeable oil within a couple hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been Rouge for 3 years now and get the Play! Box, so I have been sent so many samples of other primers. I always come back to this one as it is the best all around performer for my oily, acne prone, large -pore 44 year old face.  For reference, my skin cannot cannot stand anything with silicone/dimethicone as it leaves a layer that suffocates my skin and makes my foundation sit on top of slippery grossness.  This feels more like a serum that creates a grip for my Armani  Luminous silk foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What is this magic voodoo? I got a sample of this when I bought the Guerlain foundation and I donu2019t even know what happened or how but my skin literally got firmer, plumper and made my makeup look phenomenal.   Iu2019ve worn this with both Guerlain and other foundations and I swear this primer is why they all look flawless.   Iu2019ve got 2 kids, one newborn, I never sleep basically but I throw this on and my skin looks like Iu2019ve slept and Iu2019m just glowing!  Highly recommend for anyone who needs that pick me up with their skin and doesnu2019t mind the pricetag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful on the skin Great under makeup or alone on bare skin Moisturizing but not greasy

reviews.review_title: get it if you want flawless makeup .
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This actually the first time that Iu2019ve used a primer and seen a huge difference.. makeup staying on forever and ever , it does give a flawless look plus no pores no settling make up into creases .. i has this issue where my make up would settle into crease not with this primer it doesnu2019t, also it give me semi-Matt  yet radiant look .. it does keep your face hydrated and keep oils at bay .. I really love this primer I tried not using one day before purchasing the full size and I bought it coz no comparison. Yes I highly recommend it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i bought this in the guerlain store in disney world. a huge purchase knowing i only had $300 for the trip. but i don't regret it. it is amazing for when you want the hydrated glowy look. amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First tried this product as it was included in a Sephora Favorites Luxury set. Primer is sparkly in the bottle but it doesnu2019t transfer to the face. It just produces a nice, even glow. Creates a perfect, smooth canvas for makeup application and makeup stays in place for hours.   There are other primers out there that are effective and cost less, but if you are looking for something luxurious that will make you feel pampered and fabulous for a night out, look no further. I only made it halfway through my sample bottle before ordering the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this primer! I'm in my early 30s with dull, somewhat textured skin, and I lean towards full coverage foundation due to uneven coloring. I originally bought this to try as a regular primer. What I've ended up doing is mixing with my full coverage foundation. It helps it stick and gives a more natural, glowy finish-even after using some setting powder. Also seems to keep foundation from sinking into fine lines around my eye area!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried so many primers & this is the first that hasnu2019t made me 1. break out or 2. look like Iu2019m wearing a ton of makeup or a mask. I mix two pumps of this with powder foundation or bronzer and Iu2019m low maintenance good to go for the day. Super light weight and my skin loves it.

reviews.review_title: A good primer but not worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good primer, but I really do not think it is worth the high price. There is nothing wrong with it but is it better than my NYX Hyrdotouch? Or my Innisfree primers? No.

reviews.review_title: love this primer more for hydrating skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love itu2019s good on the skin tighten and lifts and hydrated the skin you can use this with or without makeup

reviews.review_title: The only primer that works for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin reacts very badly to silicone heavy primers, I get acne within hours of applying them. I stopped using primers altogether. I recently got a sample of this primer from sephora and now I use it every single day without ever having to worry about my skin. It feels so light and makes my makeup look fresh all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this primer. it smells really good, and feels hydrating on the skin. it leaves a tacky surface so foundation sticks to it and lasts a long time. not sure I can justify the price though, but during the rouge 20% off sales, Iu2019d definitely recommend picking one up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!! Best primer Iu2019ve ever used.  Makes my skin look plump and hydrated, foundation goes on so smoothly! I use it even if Iu2019m not wearing foundation! Everyone should try this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although it looks pretty, itu2019s not for all. I do not have sensitive skin and I usually have great success with smashbox primer. They recently changed their formula and it was a bit more watery so I decided to go with this. Although I enjoy the smell, I do not enjoy the clumps of areas of break outs (I never get zits or bumps) and I do have a odd oily/dry combo and this didnu2019t do me any favors in the foundation dept. I tried letting it dry longer and different round about ways and it still was caked. (Smashbox foundation Iu2019ve used for years) itu2019s going back to sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: best freaking primer out there but legit costs three hair cuts...I ain't here for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is absolutely amazing! I used my reward points to get the deluxe sample before splurging on the full size.. I used the entire sample to get a really good review on this and let me tell you.. IT TRANSFORMED MY SKIN. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini size of this product with a Sephora purchase and used this primer consecutively until I finished the bottle. I was wondering why my skin felt drier than usual and why my favorite dewy foundations looked so strange and didnu2019t last as long on top of this primer. After looking it up, one of the first ingredients in this product is alcohol. If you have dry skin, stay far away from this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a primer that made my base makeup look so good. It looks like I'm not wearing any makeup at all! I wish they made a smaller bottle of this, I know I won't go through a whole bottle before it expires so I don't want to waste my money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I wanted to try a Guerlain foundation and this was recommended in addition. The bottle and gold flakes are super cute, first of all. The primer comes out as a water-gel, and goes on very smoothly. And you only need a little to cover your whole face. As an oily lady, this product doesnu2019t feel heavy or pore-clogging, which is a plus. However, it seems weirdly drying to me- like I said I have oily skin, but my foundation seems to dry up and my skin gets a bit flaky with this, which Iu2019ve never experienced before. If I skip the primer and just apply foundation on top of my sunscreen I seem to have less problems.   Overall, for the price itu2019s not worth it and not that effective for me so I wonu2019t repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Either get this one or the YVES SAINT LAURENT Touche Eclat Blur Primer. Best 2 primers i've tried so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down my favorite primer.  It's my go to for both makeup and no make up days.  I like it so much that I even take it with me on work travel trips, despite the inconvenience of it's glass bottle.  For me it just makes my combo/dry skin glow a bit (again great for no makeup days) and it definitely extends the wear of my makeup. I don't need the firming aspects as much, but I will say I feel the plumping aspect.    It's just an all around great primer.   That said, it's PRICEY.  If you have something you love that works for you...stick with it.  If not, give it a go. I'm unfortunately addicted now, and am on my second bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. I have an oily skin. This primer is so smooth. Once applied on the skin, it forms a uniform layer, which is not cakey and also helps in hiding my pores. A small quantity is sufficient to cover your entire face. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I encourage everyone to look at the ingredients and do your research. This product has zero benefits. Itu2019s just a gel (which means it has alcohol) and some gold flakes. This doesnu2019t do anything for makeup or for your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am almost 62 and I find this primer is the best of all I tried for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture and smell! The gold fleck is cute and lux. However, I donu2019t feel firm or tightening effect and it does not do much. For the price tag, I expect more.

reviews.review_title: appreciate nice packaging but not a substance.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh Lu2019Or... I wanted to buy this so bad... so.. smell is nice , pieces of gold stick to your face and then disappear. Smells kind of like Guerlain meteorites. Doesnu2019t smooth your pores, fine lines and area around a nose looks like a crater... other parts of skin looks just ok with foundation. Will not repurchase. One time in life is enough. Oh and my nose gets oily during a day  for some reason with this primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Don't normally write reviews BUT this product is just fantastic. I have tried other high end primers such as Laura Mercier and the YSL one which looks similar to this one. However, I never truly noticed a huge difference when I applied those under my foundation. This stuff right here is the best primer I've ever used. My foundation lasts the whole work day without breaking up around my nose which is the biggest problem I usually have. Also have a small wrinkle that drives me mad on my forehead and I swear its gone since I started using this. It really tightens the skin and makes it look flawless. I dont have big pores to begin with so for me the most important thing is looking smooth and makeup staying in place and this primer does just that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried Tatchau2019s primer, Tarteu2019s primer, Too Faced Primer and Mac primer, nothing compares to this primer. For those complaining about it not minimizing pores or wrinkles, this is not what itu2019s for and nor does it claim to be. This primer really makes my makeup stick. I actually really love it for my eyeshadow priming the most. When you use it in conjunction with quality foundation and Urban Decayu2019s All Nighter mist, your makeup wonu2019t budge and it will look fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the holy grail primer!! One bottle lasts me 6/7 months or longer. Itu2019s stunning and you notice a huge difference. Itu2019s soooo glowy and dewy, looks amazing!! This is my go to primer and I hope they always make it forever!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love it.  Is it a primer ? but I couldn't use it as a primer because when I put it on my face It was so amazing .so beautiful no need to any foundation. I'm so happy with my purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Look, I am a student and this thing is freaking expensive. I donu2019t know what got into my head when I thought I could somehow afford it, but I bought it for having had enough of my extremely dry and cakey skin during winter. I bought this in January 12th, and today is April 12th. I am only half way into the bottle, so I can assure you this is worth the dollar. Iu2019ve done lasers in the past that made my pores completely dried out, and ever since they wouldnu2019t produce oil that make me break out. As a result, my faces are extremely dry and sensitive(not exaggerating here). Iu2019m a student who pulls all-nighter during exam weeks. This product allowed me to apply foundation the next day without having to go through the dreadful routine of masks and lotions. The smell is heavenly. The bottle looks luxurious. The stuff feels safe. The result is effective. P.S. Donu2019t buy this if you have oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Luxury in a bottle. Good for dry skin. Makeup lasts and adds a radiant glow under foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used more than 3 of this primer. Best primer ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this primer. It feels lightweight and absorbs into the skin and leaves a nice I donu2019t want to say tacky but its almost tacky base that helps your face products stay in place all day without budging. Ever since I first tried this primer going back to any other primer has been disappointing lol. I only wish it wasnu2019t so expensive and that I could get the last few drops out when I get to the bottom of the bottle.

reviews.review_title: LASTING HYDRATION AND ALL DAY WEAR
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this primer and I'm not a primer lover.  Light weight, all day hydrating but not oily and won't make your foundation seperate (even without setting), and just the right amount of gripping to make any foundation stay put all day long but won't grab or slip during complextion application (beauty blender, brush, fingers, cushion pad).  Beautiful and I love adding the Youth Water Lilly Oil just before this primer to give it extra hydrating and dewy effect for my super dry pale skin. Doesn't break me out or cause irritation.  I've used many foundations over it and never had any issues (Tom ford stick, hourglass stick, CT light wonder, GA essence cushion, guerlain L'ESSENTIAL, guerlain L'Or foundation, guerlain BB lingerie, ect). Will continue to use!! Only need a small amount, less than a pump for the entire face, bottle will last long term.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried so many primers time and time again and this has become my holy grail. When ever I used other primers before this one I always had an issue with losing the foundation on my nose in a matter of hours, although I have dry skin, my nose was always oily. When I started using this one, it not only formed a slight wrinkle I have in between my eyebrows from squinting, but it made my make up last 4-5 more hours than my other primers. I do get a tad but oily using it but it doesnu2019t bother me due to have dry skin normally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A mediocre primer. Controls oil slightly, but nothing remarkable. Especially for the price.

reviews.review_title: Overpowering Scent, Overpriced and IMO, Overrated
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like Iu2019m one of the only ones but...$83?!  For what?  It doesnu2019t pore fill.  It doesnu2019t seem to smooth out texture.  And the smell!  I mean, I get it.  Itu2019s supposed to smell luxurious, so theyu2019ve given it a highly perfumed scent.  But itu2019s too much.  If youu2019re sensitive to scents, this will be one you should avoid.  I feel like the scent is something a kindly Grandma would wear.  Itu2019s performance doesnu2019t match the price tag in my books.  Perhaps if you do not have any textural irregularities, and your skin is already pretty flawless.  Otherwise, this is a hard pass in my books.  I bought this under the recommendation of Tati and while I love her channel, makeup and skin care is so individualized, and it seems to work amazing for her, but for me...this was returned after about two weeks.  Not worth they astronomical price tag for the performance it gives.    I will say the packaging is beautiful and who isnu2019t in love with the gold flecks immersed in this primer?  Itu2019s a total luxurious experience, but one that is more about the feeling of using a $80 primer than actually the results it gives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as I hit the Order button I instantly regretted it because this cost over 70 dollars! I am a single mother, on one income and have three kids, it was the stupidest thing I have ever done.. AND I LOVE IT! Never has my makeup looked so flawless AND lasted all day. It smoothes over my face and although it doesn't have dymethicone to fill in your pores, I feel like my pores are less visible. Sometimes I'll do my makeup and it will look good from afar, but when I get up close I notice my makeup looks a little blotchy, you could see my dry patches, and in some areas my foundation cakes up. That doesn't happen with this foundation! If I had to choose one makeup item that is most important it would be this one. It has helped me with my confidence, because I no longer have to worry if I look like crap when I am talking to a person! I highly recommend it. Yes it is expensive, but one pump is all you need and it is lasting me forever it seems like. I will definitely be reordering. I am a believer that you get what you pay for.. And this is proof! #holygrail

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite bases.  It feels great going on and sinks into the skin quickly.  I donu2019t notice the firming that others have, but I do think this product is still worth the money!

I also used urban decay all nighter setting spray, but I really think this primer increased the longevity of wear. The price is a little steep, but it works very well!!

reviews.review_text: Oh why must you be soooo expensive!? I love, love, LOVE this primer. I savor every drop for my combo dry skin. Make up on top looks amazing. I mix it with little bit of liquid highlighter and a matte foundation layers perfectly on top of it. Makeup lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this primer. I have dry skin and a few fine lines and large pores. This definitely tightens the face and smooths it out. I find that it makes my foundation stick and look amazing! I have been using it with Mac studio sculpt and Dior forever. Iu2019m sad because mine is almost gone and itu2019s so expensive!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this over a year now. Oily/combo skin. Wearing this for a primer and then using Macs Mist Fix Spray keeps my makeup looking great for a good 12 hours. Doesnu2019t break me out or cause any problems with my Armani Foundation and everything else I use. Definitely got several comments a day from my friends/coworkers when I first started wearing it that my face looked brighter/fresher. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is SO amazing! I saw Jeffree Star using it constantly on his channel and needed to try it. I was blown away. Its difficult to tell any difference immediately, but once my makeup was applied I could see a huge difference in how it looked. Everything just sat better on my skin, my skin looked tight and firm, and moisturized. A little goes a long way too!! I've been using this primer for about 6 months now, am on my second bottle, and unless a miracle occurs I'll likely never switch. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is worth every penny!! Not only does it help makeup stick to the face, but it works great with every foundation Iu2019ve tried so far. I work long hours and my makeup still looks good at the end of a 9 hour day! I also love the way it makes my skin feel. Not too oily, not dried out.  And bonus, you only need a small amount (2 pumps max!! I stick with 1 1/2) so while it costs a lot up front, it will last a realllly long time!! Again, worth the price!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Decided to purchase this product after Tati Westbrook recommended this. I absolutely couldnu2019t be happier. It works itu2019s magic every single time. Seeing other reviews I have to say to always remember that any makeup look requires an excellent skincare routine. This primer alone wonu2019t solve all your skin problems. Therefore, develop a night and day skincare routine and your sling will respond to makeup much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, tacky primer. Gives a lovely glowy boost to the skin that lasts all day. Be sure to put foundation on immediately after application. Strong floral scent initially but it dissipates quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this primer! On my second bottle. Pricey but lasts a long time. One and a half pumps will cover your face completely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Luv this. It's a moisturizer and a primer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best primer I've ever had. It doesn't feel tacky at all once you put it on and feels like a light moisturizer. I have oily skin and it fills up my pores without being too moisturizing. A little bit also goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this primer, I use it with a pore blurring primer. Helps my make to last all day without breaking up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had this in and out of my basket so many times, trying to justify the price tag.  I finally got a 100-point perk sample of it, and am so glad I never wasted my money on it.  It literally did absolutely nothing--no smoothing, no pore filling, no luminizing, no lifting/firming, and not even any makeup extending.  I much, much prefer a common drugstore or mid-range primer.  Also, I disliked the pump; it left a lot of product in the bottom of the bottle that I couldn't get out--and if it had worked, for the price, I'd have wanted to get every last drop.  For reference, I am early 30s, normal-to-dry skin.  I had such high hopes, but I used it every day for the entirety of the sample, and it just didn't perform in any way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Almost out. Smells great, applies great and has a slight tacky texture. Love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best primer I have ever tried! It feels a smidge tightening but it makes everything look flawless. I havenu2019t had an issue with foundation settling in my lines since!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this primer. Two pumps is enough to cover my whole face. It smells like an old lady perfume, but it doesn't smell bad. I wish it had more gold in it though because I can only see it when I pump it in my hand, but  once it's on the face there is no gold flecks. It gets very sticky very fast, so you need to apply foundation immediately after (or blush and bronzer if you want a more natural glow). If they put more gold flakes in it, it would be more worth the money in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gives amazing glow and my makeup stays on all day.  Can not wear everyday because it tends to clog pores.

reviews.review_title: recommended for only dry or aging skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swooned when this arrived. The gold flakes and beautiful bottle will make you feel decadent! I took off one star because I didn't see a huge difference when wearing this primer, but I think that's mostly because it's not made for my skin type: I have combo skin and the description clearly says for normal to dry. Don't purchase this one unless that's the case for you. I found my face did get a little shiny when wearing it. Tati said on her review that she felt tingling & tightening. I didn't feel any difference whatsoever, however, that is not one of my skin concerns, so maybe it does have a tightening effect for others. I didn't feel like it did much to minimize the appearance of pores. The texture is very pleasant, not heavy or tacky at all. It doesn't have the usual silicone-like texture I'm more used to with other primers, which may be why I saw no difference with my pores. I will continue to use it and do recommend it for anyone with dull, dry, or aging skin who is more concerned with moisture & glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!!! This stuff is amazing. It is by far the best primer Iu2019ve ever used. I got a sample size in a Sephora Play box and I am in love. Iu2019m on the fence about spending $74 on the full size but it is so great Iu2019ll probably go for it. It makes my makeup look amazing. My face feels wonderfully smooth, Iu2019m not nearly as oily as usual and my pores are tiny!!!!

reviews.review_title: Heaven help me... and my wallet!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly the best primer I have ever used.  It really does have a firming effect and my foundation looks better when I use it.  It is expensive but, a bottle lasts me about 3 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried many primers. This blows them all out of the water! I do find this comparable to Sisley without the heavy price tag!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth the splurge if not for the product itself, but for the gorgeous packaging. Wears smoothly under makeup, but I like to apply it on bare-faced days as well. Was initially worried it wouldnu2019t work with my oily skin, but was pleasantly surprised. Happy I finally caved and purchased this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful primer and long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely one of those luxury products that you don't NEED, but its really really nice to have! I first purchased it because of a Tati review, and I will say that it does work. I see it as more of a step in my skin care regime than an actual make-up primer. And because of the price, I have a hard time using it every day. But on those days when I want to plump up my skin I will use this along with another primer (Benefit Porefessional in the t-zone) underneath my foundation. I do notice on days when I use this that my skin appears more radiant and my foundation looks smoother, less likely to grab onto dry patches or clump in creases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product but overpriced. It is very lightweight, letu2019s foundation stick to your face longer and has a great radiant finish! Makes my cakey looking foundations look extremely natural. I use this with the hourglass stick foundation for the best finish and they are my favorite combination for long wearing and glowy skin. After using up the sample, this did not irritate my skin at all. Very happy with the product so I have purchased the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was SO skeptical of this stuff. Thought it was just an overpriced luxury product. I had a sample size of it so I gave it a go. My foundation would go on smooth and radiant and would last throughout the day but I wasnu2019t convinced it was enough to spend the money. I decided to try it on half my face with the smashbox pore minimizing primer blotted on my cheek and nose and on the other size the smashbox primer on itu2019s own to compare its efficacy. Geez! I was shocked. The side of my face with this on was actually lifted. Nothing outrageous but enough for me to notice and made my face look more vibrant and flawless. The side with the smashbox primer on itu2019s own showed more flaws and wasnu2019t as plump and glowy. I was finally convinced and purchased the full size. Only reason for knocking off one star is because I feel it is definitely overpriced for a primer and the gold flakes feel so extra. That being said it is Guerlain so itu2019s gonna be pricy.

reviews.review_title: Pretty bottle, but that's about it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Average primer. For the price I did not find enough differentiation and it didn't see to help my makeup stay longer than some cheaper brands. Also just had random gold flakes on my face at times...which just got covered by makeup.  Beautiful packaging though. But wouldn't purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a little over a year now... still absolutely love it. I love the way it makes my skin look & feel. I have pretty sensitive skin & I've never had any issues with this at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for a year now and about to buy my second bottle. I have very sensitive skin and this primer goes on smoothly and keeps my face feeling nice and radiant. Itu2019s also very light weight and doesnu2019t clog up my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really wanted to love this product Iu2019ve heard nothing but fantastic reviews so I thought Iu2019d give it a try and after using it just a few times I broke out so bad on my chin! Maybe Iu2019ll try it again but just so sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this. I like to put it on and let dry down 5 min or so and then put my foundation on. The texture is super thin and light weight and has a little bit of a tacky feeling that I think helps my makeup adhere. Iu2019ve noticed that my makeup looks better for longer and that my skin looks firmer than without. I havenu2019t had any bad skin reactions or br amounts and Iu2019ve been usin for over a week now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is freaking magical. I got a sample and I was so eager to buy more because it makes my skin look photoshopped, but I'm sorry, 75 bucks is ridiculous.
Although a bit expensive - one of the best primers Iu2019ve ever used. Well worth the moola!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: THIS PRIMER IS GORGEOUS. I love this product so much. It looks amazing with the hourglass stick foundation. JUST AMAZING! I wish the price was lower :/

reviews.review_title: Didn't want to love this but I can't live without
reviews.review_text: I always thought primers were overhyped. I kept hearing how I needed a good primer blah blah blah. I tried pretty much every single best selling primer out there. Mac, Hourglass, Benefit, Smashbox, NARS, etc and I wasn't impressed. On a whim I added the Guerlain deluxe sample to an order. And OMG. My makeup went on like butter. I thought my makeup went on fine without primer but this made it melt into my skin with a beautiful glow. And I still have that same glow and perfect makeup after a long workday and walking around the city. I hate that I love it so much. Like everyone else, I never dreamt of spending $74 on a primer. That is more than my Chanel foundation! Nonetheless, I ended up purchasing the full size. I told myself that it's makeup and skincare in one. And I'm hopeful that it will last a long time since a little goes a long way. My skin is combo and this does help control my oil. It does fill my pores if I layer it a little more. And the old flecks dissolve and may be the reason for the glow.

reviews.review_title: Beauty Gurus Made Me Buy It
reviews.review_text: Let's face it, I bought this because of YouTube beauty gurus raving about it. But in all honesty, I've only used it a handful of times for uber special occasions because I don't have $74 lying around to splurge on his from using it everyday. To me, it's not worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST primer for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky enough to get a sample size of this in one of my orders. Honestly I was mostly excited for the fact that there was little gold flakes in it. Nothing like feeling fancy lol.  The formula itself is really smooth and even. It doesn't leave my skin feeling oily, or sticky. It actually left it feeling very moisturized. It didn't clog my pores (like some primers)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a sucker for anything in a pretty bottle, but this is worth the price and doesn't irritate my very sensitive skin. And to top it all off it allows my makeup to stay in place all day! I love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I hate how much I like this! I am currently using Retin-A and as you may know, have peeling skin all the time! The Hourglass Veil primer is usually my go-to but that sometimes accentuates my flakes. I used this on a whim, from the sample received in the Luxury Play bag a few months ago, and I fell in love! I bought the full size and am using it everyday. It does something special to my skin that I can't ever describe. The alcohol is concerning, but this does feature glycerin and of course -- gold! Ah, I am a sucker for it. Also, it doesn't seem to be making me break out or clogging my pores. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Suppleness and Lifting without the Facelift
reviews.review_text: This product works great at giving your face a natural supple look while tightening and lifting the face oh so  slightly u269cufe0f

Hands-down one of the best primers I have ever used, it leaves my skin very firm yet soft and supple. I understand that it come with a hefty price tag but a little goes a very long way and it's worth every single penny. This absorbs into my skin immediately and my foundation applies flawlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is AMAZING!!! I always go through different primers but this one is truly the best. I did my makeup at 10 am and I didn't go to sleep until 1:30 in the morning and I am not kidding my makeup still looked amazing! I have combo to dry skin and it sinks into your skin and is super lightweight! I recommend this product to everyone! Yes, it is pricey but it is sooooo worth it in my eyes!  The picture I posted was my makeup with using the primer! Ugh love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I've only used this twice so far, I got a deluxe sample with my last order and WOW! I have oily and very sensitive skin and it works great for me :) It keeps my makeup on for hours on end, smells great, love the texture and cooling effect!! I literally sweat and usually my makeup slides off my forehead but its still there ! Will be getting the full size asap...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I really didn't expect anything from this product. Received it as a deluxe sample. The gold flakes just sounded like a gimmick but I REALLY like how my makeup looks and stays so fresh when I use it.  I would love to purchase it except for the price...OUCH! Not sure it's worth that.  I rarely use primers so I don't have anything to compare it to.  Gonna really have to think about this purchase...

reviews.review_title: I hate that I love this so much
reviews.review_text: Tati Westbrook raved about this primer. I never thought I'd ever get to try this. But when I saw that you can get a sample with each $45 purchase online, I ordered 3 separate $45  online. I tried it yesterday with the nars all day luminous foundation & armani power fabric foundation today. My skin stayed flawless all day both days! I didn't touch up at all just sprayed hoola make up setting spray 30 spf once or twice & my make up stayed put all day! I have very oily skin and my make up tends to smear & cake up... this primer is phenomenal. Will I spend $74 on this? I don't know yet....I will try a different foundation every day for the rest of the days of this week with this primer. then a different primer next week with different foundations everyday...to find out whether it's the primer or the foundation or the hoola spray. But so far really really amazing!

I got a deluxe sample size for my VIB ROUGE Reward. I honestly thought people who paid  $74 for a primer were being extra & NEVER thought I would ever EVER fall in love with it as much as I did. It seriously makes my skin look AMAZING & I have a LOT of texture to my face, this makes it look flawless! I am SERIOUSLY considering splurging buying a full size. No other primer  (& I have tried a LOT of primers looking for my HG primer) has ever made my base look so incredibly flawless. When I use this, I don't see as much texture, actually I see almost none (& I have tried almost every pore filling primer to fill in that texture). Then on top of that, it makes my facell radiant!! I would have given this 5 Stars but knocked down a star for the price. But DANG it's seriously almost worth it!

I chose this as my deluxe sample on a recent order to try and see if it's worth the $. (I'm a die hard smash box primer girl from their original to their radiance). This reminds me of ysl primer both in look and texture, however this one is more tacky when applied. Makeup doesn't look any better or worse when compared to other primers I've used. So for me the price tag to actual product doesn't match. I have drier sensitive skin and this didn't irritate my skin or get patchy.  It's a decent primer but for the cost I'd expect more.

What an incredible primer!! I've lucked out and with the new 100 point rewards just ordered my 3rd sample size. My first was the one in the $20 playboy which I hope they continue to offer!!  How can a beauty junkie not love Guerlain?? They make one of my absolute favorite mascaras too.  About the primer, it really does lift and smooth out the complexion for a flawless canvas to apply makeup on. I use the Dior Dreamscape Totale also and that was always my favorite. But the gold flecks on the L'or do produce a glow from within when you apply make up over it. I use a tinted primer or a bb cream. The only foundation I ever use is the UD PRESSED POWDER foundation and I prefer it under my eyes or as a nontour. So I never fully cover my primer.   When I'm out of the sample sizes, I assure you I'll be buying the Guerlain L'Or. it's just too beautiful to live without!!

reviews.review_title: I didn't want to love it but I really do
reviews.review_text: I first tried this in my Rouge play box. I thought this stuff would just be another gimmick product. I have combination skin and huge pores on my nose, so it seems no matter what primer I use makeup and primer would still puddle in my pores and make my pores more noticeable. I tried this and the first day I notice my pores didn't have make up puddles in them. Tired it again next day and same result. I also notice my foundation lasted longer than normal (about 9 hours as oppose to the usual 5-6 I get). I have now been using it for two weeks and it is incredible. I just purchased the full size but still have over half my trial size left. A little goes a long way. 2 pumps max. My skin is not oily and I swear looks better the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is by far one of my favorites. It has the perfect tacky texture that makeup just grabs right onto. I truly love the smell, texture, and overall look of this primer. It leaves the skin luminescent and it not too heavy. It really does make the foundation last at least twice as long as a normal primer would. I love that my makeup doesn't separate or break down at all, and that I don't get too oily throughout the day either. Absolutely worth the price. I just purchased the Guerlain Meterorites Base Perfecting Primer as well, and hopefully it's as amazing as this one is!

reviews.review_title: hate that I love it so much
reviews.review_text: best primer ever and smells amazing. It's expensive but everytime I use this primer there is no doubt that my skin looks flawless. I will always repurchase this!

I was really excited to receive this because I love Guerlain, but when I used it for the first time, it was kind of a bummer. There wasn't anything super special about it, which is upsetting for the high price. It made my face feel and look super oily, and I felt uncomfortable all day. The only plus side is it looks pretty and smells nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am currently waiting for my second order of this to arrive because I ran out of the first one. Now, I love luxury items, but for the most part I really only buy luxury makeup that I'm obsessed with. I had high hopes the first time around because of all the Youtubers I watch who were absolutely raving about it (and I wanted to feel super classy and boogie, too, I'll admit).
