To be totally honest, at first I was a little surprised because it wasn't as thick as I thought it'd be. It's sort of like a hand sanitizer's consistency, like a water-infused gel. You see little gold flakes in every single pump and even tho I would go crazy and use 2-3 for my whole face and neck, you TRULY only need 1, 2 at the absolute maximum, but really one will do the job, just apply it quickly because it does absorb very fast.   Even using 2x too much, if not more, literally everyday, sometimes admittedly twice in one day (I was crazy and I wanted my friends to try it too) the bottle still lasted me about three months, so I'd say if you conserve you can easily get 6 out of this bottle.  Did I feel the insane lifting and tigthtening everyone's talking about at first? Not entirely.  But I did notice that applying it in an upward motion starting at my neck and working up to my forehead made a big difference in the firmness and tightness of my skin.   But what REALLY SOLD ME on this product and is the reason I am REPURCHASING it is actually what I noticed after I ran out. Like I said, I used it obsessively every single day and I got used to it. So when I stopped using it, I realized that my foundation wasn't lasting as long and wasn't looking as flawless, no matter what other primer I used, or founation, or how I applied it, or how good my skincare was. Finally, I had to admit to myself that it was this extremely expensive item that made my makeup flawless and stay on throughout most of the day.   Sorry for such a long review, I literally never write these, but I also literally never re-purchase luxury items unless they're worth it. So the last thing I'll say is, I know it seems like an insane purchase, but think about how much money you'll save from not having to buy primer after primer when this really does work its magic.   My advice: The perfect combination that I can NOT beat right now (even after trying this primer with Dior's Capture Totale which is 83 dollars) is GUERLAIN L'OR PRIMER and DIOR AIRFLASH FOUNDATION (I am not ultra fair, but fair, and 202 CAMEO is my perfect shade and I'm telling you, nothing works better with one another than these two products. I literally wish I could like buy samples of them both and send them to everyone reading this because it really is that freaking flawless.   Okay, I'm done ranting. But if you're on the fence, just do it. I really really don't think you'll regret it. And if you have it and are underwhelmed, try a little test and use this with another primer or no primer on each side of your face with the exact same foundation/concealer/etc. I'm telling you you'll see a difference, if not immediately, by the end of the day.   Hope this helps!!!! LONG LIVE THE MAKEUP <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been on the hunt for a makeup primer that actually works for me. Never in my life would I have ever thought that I would spend this much money on one! But holy moly, batman, this is AMAZING!! My makeup stays for hours, and it only takes 1 pump to prime the areas I prime. My 51 year old skin is very happy with this primer!

Great primer, not oily or sticky! Set the foundation very well! Due to its high price point, I try to find a replacement but cannot find anything yet!! In general, it is a wonderful product! Recommend!

This primer is hands down the most fun to put on. The gold flecks are great and instantly absorb. The texture comes out like a hand sanitizer but perfects the pores! Any foundation you use ( I recommend YSL) will look flawless on top of this primer.   Luxury but worth the price! One jar has lasted well over 6 months with use everyday!

I use this over my Mario Badescu Aloe moisturizer mixed with Supergoop oil sunblock then apply Sephora liquid/serum foundation, top it with MB rose spray, then Urban Decay stay Matte setting spray and I'm a dewy dream. I am OILY so it's hard for me to look dewy with out looking greasy and this is definitely a great addition. However it is REALLY pricey. I tried it in the Play! Luxury box for VIB rouge and I love it! I can't even save it for special occasions because it works like a dream. I may have to splurge on a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I want a good makeup day, I start with this primer. This is unquestionably the best primer product I have used. It goes on somewhat like a gel, but dries down tacky, holding blended foundation in place, and enabling a smooth application of additional products over the top. Little gold-fleck glints will keep you smiling through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is unlike any other primer I have used. I have tried MANY primers including all of the favorites and bestselling ones. This one is the best! It leaves your skin slightly tacky, which I love because it makes your foundation stick. I use the tarte rainforest of the sea foundation and it sits beautifully on top of this primer.

reviews.review_title: No, For Real. I love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've seen mixed reviews on how this works for combo/oily skin. I know you can fry an egg on my face after a few hours without a good primer. And this bad boy has my skin looking and feeling like BUTTER. like you can seriously spread my face on a piece of toast! The price is off putting. I'm a splurger on make up and will just return if I dont like, but my skin is sooooo glowing when using this under my normal foundation/concealer routine. I just bought it last week so I havent really given it the long 18 hour test or anything. But im still looking good after a full 10 hour work day and may only blot once but nothing major. If i need to stay matte all day I'd probably still stick to my MUF step 1. But when I want to glow and slay a bih, I'm going here! I will definitely be repurchasing.

I wanted to love this so bad since I have the Abielle Royale line. But this primer left me feeling all too oily especially in my T zone and around my nose and cheeks. I am 30 and have combination/oily skin. tried it for two weeks and just returned it today :(

reviews.review_title: I hate that I LOVE THIS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I've been searching for the IDEAL makeup primer for a looooooong time now. I've heard amazing things about this primer - and they are all true! Although the price is pretty steep, I absolutely love everything about this primer. The fragrance is nice, you don't need a lot of product and my face literally feels tighter and smoother right after application. My makeup stays on all day and my skin looks flawless. Since you don't need a lot of product, I'm guessing the bottle will last a while. TOTALLY worth the investment!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would not recommend anyone with combination or oil skin purchase this product. When you apply the product it leave a very little sticky residue is tolerable. Halfway through the day my face gets super oily when wearing this product underneath. Probably a better product for someone with dry skin!
I Just get it, but I want a backup!!!

I purchased this after watching a Tati video where she had such great things to say about it. I travel for my job and my skin is very dry. This works beautifully for me. My skin feels great and makeup lasts.

My skin is dry and I love it soooo much. I already finished one and this is my second purchase. However I will only buy it when there is 15% or 20% off since it is too expensive. I do want to find some substitutes but I didn't find any so far.
This primer is amazing! I'm dry skin, but it works!

First of all, I am a makeup junkie. I have tried so many primers and haven't found one that I've stuck to... then comes along this luxurious gem! I use this product under makeup and it makes my skin look flawless all day! I even use it on my bare face on my minimal/no makeup days and it makes my skin glow and look so healthy! I feel like it plumps my skin and also makes my pores look smaller. The gold in the primer seems to shrink my pores. I hate that it's so pricey because I love it so much! I'll admit, I didn't want to like it BUT I definitely consider it a must-have for my makeup routine! I'm completely sold on this :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate leaving reviews and this might be my second one ever after years of being a VIB Rouge, but I simply had to for this product. It is THE single GREATEST thing that has EVER happened to me. I used to have a huge problem with eye makeup dusting off onto my concealer no matter what I tried and my foundation caking on the sides of my nose regardless of endless searches thinking my foundation was the problem. It wasn't. My skin is EXTREMELY dry and nothing made it look dewy enough to last all day and not cake my foundation and make my pores look huge by the end of the day. Until this. Every SINGLE makeup problem I had is gone. My makeup is perfect as if I had just applied it an hour ago by the end of a long day. It is outstanding. If reviews mean anything to you, take my word for it. If you have dry, sensitive skin look no further than this. Swallow the price tag and dive into this awesomeness. I'll never not have this primer; it has become a forever product.
Just few words this is is amazing!!!!

As long as I can afford this, I'm using it for as long as my skin allows it. I'm a combination skin, late 20s and all I can say is if you're a skin junkie, this primer/serum is so so Amazing. My makeup looks FLAWLESS for 10 hours at a time. Sometimes, I wear no makeup just to wear this and my skin looks SNATCHED.
For dry skin this is the best primer ever! Absolutely love the texture and how it makes my face luminous and supple all day. It holds my makeup very well too!!

My expectations for this product matched its price tag.. high. However I was super disappointment. It was an okay primer but I ended up using my old one with it because it didn't give my skin the glow I wanted. I'm only giving it 1 star because it ended up falling out of the makeup bag and shattering   Just like my hopes I had for it...

reviews.review_title: pretty bottle but doesn't do anything
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product because a lot of youtubers swear by it. Does absolutely nothing. It look pretty on my vanity though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its a great primer, its lifting and hydrating. my makeup applies beautifully after I use it. Also, highly recommend if you're using a matte foundation!
I love this primer. My make up glides on amazing. Works well with everything. My skin looks amazing after applying. My skin feels hydrated when I apply it. I'm almost out I will be re-purchasing

I purchased this because I love guerlain skin cares and it had great reviews.   Not only do I not see any positive difference when I wear this, but this thing is causing my skin to breakout within 15 minutes after applying, followed by at least 2 days of dry patches. Finaly, as I looked at the ingredients, I realised I had just paid 80$ for a bottle of alcohol that has gold particles in it. It's just really not worth it.

This primer helps my makeup last all day and gives a nice moisturized, radiant base. It smells a bit like something my grandmother would use though haha. I think the price it a little bit high but it is a good product.

I received this primer as a Deluxe sample and it is the BEST primer EVER. It is extremely hydrating, leaves a great base to lay down foundation or even for a nice natural no makeup glow. Primer, hydrator and anti-aging! Yes please!! I will be purchasing the full size.

Seriously, this is hands down THE BEST primer I've ever used. I've tried everything. I have combo/oily skin and this one not only makes my skin feel amazing and tightened, but it literally keeps my makeup flawless all day long. I have to blot my foundation around my nose area a little bit but it's not bad at all. I used to use the smashbox original photo finish primer and I thought that one was great but this one has definitely replaced it! The price tag is pretty crazy, but I personally think it's so worth it. I use about two pumps for my whole face and it's perfect. If you're on the fence, you need to just get it. Highly recommend!

I've been using this primer for quite a while now and I can honestly say it's the best one I've ever used. Hydrates, but also keeps my face from getting oily in the T-zone. Yes, it's pricey, but a little goes a long way. I literally use a pea sized drop for my entire face, so the bottle lasts a long time.  I'm in my 50's and quality products are a must for me.  I'm a fan for life!

reviews.review_title: Flawless finsih, light & makes me feel decadent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm highly sensitive to any weight or product on my face but this feels weightless, doesn't block my pores, and my Guerlain lingerie de peau foundation smooths over flawlessly. It gives excellent finish without too much shimmer for daytime wear so I can add my highlighters without looking like a sparkle monster. My mother got me started on Guerlain products at 21. I'm 31 now and have not once started to worry about fine lines, crows feet, etc. Guerlain's packaging is so elegant I love having my products displayed proudly on my countertop. It's a nod to vintage glamor.

It seriously is one of the best and most hydrating primers with anti aging properties!!  Thus the price but you see and feel the hydration immediately!!  as a pro makeup artists, I swear by this primer for my dry clients wanting a glow!

Although this is pricy, if you like to splurge on makeup and grow your collection, I think this is an amazing investment. This makes my makeup blend and last beautifully. My skin isn't in much need of firming  so I'm not sure how the firming power of it works. All around great primer. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Saw it on Tati's youtube channel and purchased it and its awesome. I get compliments all the time.

reviews.review_title: the best, last long , no break out..... its gold
reviews.review_text: I know its expensive, but hey . You need to have sample first before you buy it. And i was surprise after 2 days, i have no break out..... and my skin , oh yes.... firm and i saw little difference from my make up... of course i bought it right away.... im happy , and i want to buy more.....

reviews.review_title: Sadly not worth the price tag !
reviews.review_text: Upon application this product feels as if it is tightening the skin. You feel a cool sensation for about 30 mins and then fades away.  I noticed no difference in the longevity of my foundation with this makeup base. I expected a lot for for a product with this price tag.

I notice a huge difference in how long my makeup lasts when I use this primer. It seriously makes everything stay ALL day. I've never had that experience with any primer. It also feels nice on my skin and smells wonderful. It's completely worth the money!
Love this primer. I like to mix this with my Laura mercier radiance primer before applying foundation. My skin feels more firm and the slight tackiness seems to be a good canvas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First day putting this on, I felt the coolness and tightening effect everyone raves about. It didn't last. Esp by the end of the day,  my face way way more oily than ever. I naturally have a slightly oily face by the end of the day, but when using this i saw a noticeable difference.  So I gave it 3 or 4 more days of a try, and.. same thing, every time. Because I'm not a fan of my smile lines and pores being so prominent... I did return this because of how grossly hydrating it is for me. It hadn't done anything else overall. :-/

This product does wonders for the skin... for any type of skin combo, oily, dry,.. it's perfect! It is worth your money and the gold flakes inside of this primer is just so unique! I love and you'll love it too

reviews.review_title: So worth the $$$ for my Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had my doubts about this product because of the word RADIANCE. I have very oily skin and anything that is supposed to be radiant makes me look super oily. This product is the exception. It's a gel like formula that soaks up into your skin almost immediately. You feel a very slight tackiness on your skin. This made my makeup last all throughout an 8 hour workday. I applied my makeup at 6:30 am and I didn't have the need to blot until 5:30 pm. My skin had a very slight luminosity but did not look oily. My skin looked smooth and radiant. Not oily but radiant with a Demi matte finish. If you have dry skin and you are looking for an extremely luminous glow. I don't think this product will do it for you. If you have Normal/Combo/Oily skin and want a slight luminous finish while still looking matte/Demi matte, this product is for you. I didn't really notice a lift but the finish it gave me makes it worth the price tag!!

I love this primer and I'm not easily impressed! I do recommend this for more mature skin so you can see the difference. I have sensitive skin and this does not irrated my skin. Also I don't understand the complaints of the strong smell because there's barely any. I do use a pore filing primer in conjunction with this because I have large pores and this is not a silicone filling primer. My sister even notices when I use this primer. I do feel it gives me a more plump and lifted skin.

I bought this on the recommendation of a Sephora store two who raved about it. I expected to like it but it doesn't do anything for me. My makeup doesn't look any different than if I'd used nothing. For this price, I'd have expected it to knock my socks off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this being super excited to be a perfect skinned glowing goddess; what a disappointment! It feels like putting hand disinfectant on your face (smells like it too.) I expected better. This was pure junk.

I am heartbroken by this product. I am someone who adores Guerlain and other 'luxury' makeup brands and this one has really upset me. When I bought it is was so excited after hearing people rave about this primer but after 1 use, after 30 seconds, my skin started to itch and break out! I don't have sensitive skin at all and had just cleared my acne so I am very upset. I wouldn't recommend this sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While the packaging does look pretty, the primer itself is literally a joke. It definitely does not firm as it claims to do nor did it do what itu2019s meant to do- PRIME. I never expected it to be blurring or whatever, but I did hope it would give me a glow, some firmness and prep my skin for makeup. But I was disappointed. And the WORST part- IT BROKE ME OUT!!!!! Now my skin can take a lot- its not sensitive by any means and even after a lot of cheaply made products, my skin has held up. But this $60 u201cgoldu201d primer caused severe acne. And I am a 100% sure that its is because of the heavy scent. Be warned people- Perfume is BAD for your skin and it will affect you at some point! There are many good primers out there. I would stay away from this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is expensive, but I truely loved it.  This is lightweight although moisturizing, refreshing, and provides radiance.  One pomp is enough for the whole face.  I used it on myself and on my mom... it looked good on both of us, it plumps the skin.  I never tried it on its own, but under foundation, it looks very good.

feels so nice on your skin. feels cold and really wakes me up in the morning. also it feels taken so my foundation sticks and stays all day! the gold is so beautiful. i love this. it is pricey. the moister in it thought makes you not have to but a lotion for your face
I absolutely loooove this primer. It's just so amazing and it just really gives you a nice glow and the finish is beautiful

Best Luxurious Primer I have EVER used! I went through various high end primers and I can say in confidence that this primer is the best. It makes your face glow naturally and you only need a little to spread it all over your face. A little goes a long way.
Really wanted to hate this because of the price...but it is honestly the best primer I've ever used in my entire life... will be repurchasing.

Heard about this on Kim K and had to try it. Seriously! Kept my makeup on from 8am-midnight.. pretty much until I decided to wash my makeup off. I've tried the Ysl one and it just isn't the same as this one. This one is special it also has 24k gold flakes. It just makes my makeup look so flawless and beautiful all day.
I bight it because it has good review and I am glad I bought it. It has become my favorite primer

I purchased this because Jeffree Star's rave review. It goes on so well, but that's about it. I should honestly give it one star but it smells great. If your skin is even SLIGHTLY oily stay away. I put it on at 5 am and by 9 I was already blotting like crazy! Even the guys at work asked if I was working out in my office because my face has looked so oily the last few days. (Which is a huge deal if guys are saying something) I noticed no lifting or minimizing of pores. I gave it to my mom who doesn't even use primer and she was no where near impressed. Won't ever spend the $70.00 again. Definitely returning this for my normal primer. Such a bummer for as high as my hopes were.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this tightens my skin, I did only half of my face to really see if it worked. It worked! I was so happy that I didn't waist my money. I love how my makeup looks on top of this primer. I feel like I can see my skin glowing form beneath. I have also changed my skin care routine because I was getting little milla bumps all over my face. This primer doesn't to that. I feel like my face looks so smooth, I love the way my face looks even before putting on foundation. I have since also started to use powder foundation seeing my skin has been so much brighter and tighter. I will always buy this now..

So I watch a lot of youtubers, and they have raved about this primer for the longest time (Tati, Jeffree, & Jaclyn) and I finally caved in and got it. It's a high dollar price tag, but I use one pump occasionally and I'll use other primers throughout the week. But this one gives the prettiest luminous glow, but it's not very firming on my skin personally. I have normal skin with occasional breakouts.   The smell is so nice, and it glides my foundation on perfectly. I pair this with my Lancu00f4me foundation with a beauty blender and my face comes out airbrushed and flawless!

I got this primer for Christmas and honestly I love the way makeup goes over it. I'm a huge makeup junky and I love finding new primers to give my skin a nice glowy finish. It doesn't minimize your pores but it's not supposed to. The way my foundation went on was magical. I completely recommend.

reviews.review_title: people read the description before you buy please!
reviews.review_text: Almost all of the negative reviews for this primer are because it doesn't minimize their pores... IT DOESNT CLAIM TO!! That's not what this primer is for. This is a firming, glow primer. Now the reviewers that said it did not firm their skin that's believable because it's not going to work for everyone. But the people complaining because it didn't minimize their pores are wrongly giving this primer bad reviews. Please read the description and remember to only expect what the product claims to do nothing more.
Some things are just worth the splurge.. this is one of them. If you want to look more youthful and refreshed, look no further. u2665ufe0f
I bought this for my mom for Christmas and she loves it! She said it felt luxurious and made her skin feel twenty years younger
Seriously. My title says it all. My skin and I are addicted to this stuff!
I bought this for my mom (she's 50) and she's only been using it for about a week and her skin already looks better!

This product makes my skin feel so tight and lifted, and it literally takes one small pump to cover your entire face. Yes, it maybe a little pricey but I totally feel it was worth the money. Definitely a holy grail product for me!
Flawless amazing problem. The best I have ever tried

I have tried just about all the primers I could get my hands on that were less expensive than this one but all have done nothing to make my makeup last longer and not crease. This one does the job and I am so happy I got it!

reviews.review_title: Very hydrating.... nothing else I could say
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and this is very hydrating, especially great during Winter. But other than this, I don't know if there is anything else I could say about it. Not really worth the money

Man this primer is expensive...I love this primer but not because it lifts...I actually don't see any lifting at all...BUT this makes my makeup lasts all day. It's the only primer that I feel actually makes my makeup lasts. It does give my face a glow but I don't know if it's from the actual serum or the gold flakes..I don't even know the gold flakes even do anything. It has a beautiful subtle scent.. Despite all that, I still love this primer..just for the fact that it lasts, gives me a glow and makes my makeup look flawless. Unfortunately for me, I'll probably repurchase again..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is pretty good. I picked it up at the VIB rouge sale and it does a nice job of hydrating the skin before foundation.  However I dont think this firms my skin whatsoever. But it is nice.

This primer lifts and hydrates. It's the best primer I've used. A little goes along way so for the price you can definitely get it to last. It's cool to the skin and smells beautiful. My skin feels completely different. I've used every primer out there. This primer also will not clog your pores. I have not had a breakout since using this primer. It must protect the pores from getting clogged with makeup and dirt. Love it!!

If you're going to splurge on a makeup product it should be this. It has done wonders to my skin! I have oily skin to begin with so I do tend to go towards a semi-matte foundation (givenchy photo'perfexion or makeup forever hd), my foundation goes on smoothly and it lasts forever. It also adds a beautiful healthy glow from within. Every time I use this primer I get tons of compliments.

I first heard of this primer on Tati's YouTube and have since heard other try it and like it, so I finally got it during the VIB sale and I love it! I use Clinique moisture surge, then this Guerlain primer, let that sit a few mins and work on my brows (I use typically one, maybe one and a half pumps of the primer), then I go in with my foundation, I've really been loving Estu00e9e Lauder double wear (I don't know why I waited so long to get that foundation either lol), and no joke, if I fall asleep with my makeup on, it's still on my face in the morning! The combination of the primer and foundation lasts forever! Yes the primer is tacky, but if you let it sit a few minutes before going in with foundation you'll have absolutely no problem blending in, your makeup lasts, you only have to use a drop of it so the product will last a really long time, personally I love the product and will repurchase when it eventually runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i sampled this and the only thing it did was create a sort of tacky texture so my foundation stuck to it better. i'd say the foundation lasted a bit longer but looked less smooth than with other primers or without primer and also kind of dry...(i tried it with both nars sheer glow and dior air flash). also i didn't feel nor see any kind of lifting or firming effect from this primer. LOTS of people rave about this product and claim it does feel firming and looks great so I'm sure it just didn't work for me personally but might work well for others. get a sample before you buy it!
I got this as a gift from a friend, I love using it but I would never buy it. There are so much more affordable brands that offer the same type of primer
Absolutely awesome primer it makes my make up look gorgeous and it takes instantly years from my face and neck it really does tightten my skin really worth every penny definitely wil reach for more
This product was a waste of money. Did nothing to make my Makeup stay on longer or apply smoothly. Returned! Disappointed
My favorite primer ever! Makes my makeup go on nice and smooth. A little goes a long way and smells really nice. Love the packaging! Would definitely repurchase it

I'm so disappointed in this product. It doesn't minimize pores. It doesn't keep my makeup from budging. I noticed no skin firming whatsoever. It smells nice and it's beautiful packaging, but I'd have to use a smoothing primer with it. For the price, I expect more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this primer exclusively for a while, I have about 1/4 left in the bottle.  I really haven't noticed any improvement on my skin or makeup application.  It's not terrible, and it does feel nice going onto my skin but that's about it.  It doesn't have any smoothing or glowing effect.  Can't really tell if it's making my makeup last longer either.  I won't be repurchasing this.
Makes your skin look so amazing, my most favourite holy grail primer ever... can't go wrong! Buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: totally worth the price, makes my makeup glide on and stay all day while adding a natural glow to my skin

If you're looking for a primer that helps your skincare AND creates a gel base for your makeup. I don't think it's silicone base, definitely has a wax, sticky touch to it. This will change your face, making your skin tighten immediately and appear firmer over time. However, this will not minimize any pores, just add on your mattifying on your pore spots and you are good to go. I can never imagine my makeup routine without this, my total staple. I'll still spray a setting spray with my foundation and I find that combo makes my foundation last all fay
90$ and one of the worst primers I've used, it acts more like a moisturizer, does not minimize pores, makes face sort of oily before you apply your foundation which just makes your foundation crease
Absolutely amazing! Worth the money!
I love this primer, it gives my skin a little lift and my makeup stays put a lot longer throughout the day!

I cant say that this is my absolute favorite primer ever. This is the most expensive primer i have ever bought would i repurchase it again? Nope. There are plenty of others that are even better than this one. j one jelly pack is hands down my favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is everything!!!  It makes my foundation flawless. I have used everything and was so annoyed spending $30-40 on a primer that I saw no results from so I took a tip from Nikkie Tutorials and used Nivea shave balm forever. Then I heard about this stuff and basically thought this is the LAST primer I will try and I'm so glad I did. The bottle is lasting forever. It smells great and it does everything it says it does!!!!  Will definitely be repurchasing!

Love this primer!! It firms the skin and makeup goes on flawlessly and stays put all day. I have dry skin and usually deal with my foundation creasing under the eyes and clinging to dry patches, but not with this primer.. It also makes my skin and makeup look more even and radiant. I have been getting compliments on my skin and people have been asking what products I have been using. For me, it is well worth the price and I highly recommend

For me..this works beautifully. A little goes a long way and I find that it does firm and give me a nice glow without looking greasy. I do have combination/sensitive skin and I haven't found it to irritate or break me out. Every time I wear this under my makeup I get tons of compliments. Love the product,just not the price.

I wanted to hate this. I've never been a primer kind of girl. Let alone a $74 primer kind of girl. But alas I tried this considering at 32 my skin just wasn't as lifted as it was in my 20's and my make up just wasn't applying and lasting like I wanted it too. So I got the chance to visit a big Sephora that carried it, my eyes glazed over, and before I knew it my debit card was out and I was bringing home the fanciest primer I've ever owned. I'm in love. My make up looks like it was just applied all.day.long! It really does make my pores look non existent and my skin a little more youthful. I'm a little annoyed that I fell in love for such a pricey product but a little goes a long way and it should last me a long time. This is a splurge. Are there other primers that work wonders at keeping make up on longer, sure! But if you're in the market for a primer that helps make up longevity and provides some skin appearance improvement this is a good one. It's not a long term skin improvement product as far as I can tell. But I love what it does provide while wearing it. It hasn't broken my sensitive skin out or caused any issues. It doesn't feel heavy after it dries down and has foundation over it. It doesn't make your make up feel cakey either.

Bought this a few months back after stumbling upon it on the app. Was sold as soon as I read gold ( that sounds bougie ) but I tried it and loved it! This in combination with benefit porefessional is my holy grail!

I bought this product because many people raved abput it like it is the best primer and all. When i used it for the first time, i expect it to tight my pores like it was described, yet nothing happen. I guess it it a nice illuminating primer only though.  Great product, but for the price point, not impressed.
Wonderful product! It helps my foundation looking smooth and silky. It gives my skin a hydrated look. Definitely will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge of Guerlain but this primer really missed the mark. Pros: It didn't break me out and I think it gave me a nice glow? Cons: It does not firm. It made me oilier than usual hence, that might have been the glow. Conclusion: My $10 drugstore moisturizer from the drugstore moisturizes just as well as this ridiculously priced product. Returned.

Ordered this primer on Thursday received it today applied it for the first time and wow it is worth every penny my makeup went on flawlessly and lasted all day long I mean all day and my skin is oily this is pricy but I will definitely repurchase and recommend it to everyone you won't be disappointed
I love it . Like most of Guerlain products I have tried . It's a win

I got this primer because I was almost out YSL primer with the same gold bits in it. I heard this one was similar but had better effects long term so I thought why not, I already spend a ton on primer with YSL, let's add $20. Well it is NOTHING like the YSL one, which was pretty clear immediately. By the end of the day I looked so greasy and I don't have oily skin in the slightest. Stay away from this primer if you have even the SLIGHTEST natural sheen as it will just enhance that. It did not hide pores or fine lines and I didn't notice it giving my makeup any additional lasting power. I returned this pretty much immediately and bought my trusty YSL. At least now I know that one is a holy grail and pricier does not mean better!!

I absolutely love this primer, probably the best I have ever tried. I have smile lines that I absolutely hate and I've tried every primer on the market to help fill them in and nothing has worked until this primer came along. When I put this primer on, my smile lines are instantly lifted and do not disturb my makeup throughout the day! The price is pretty steep but it is worth every penny by far. I will purchase this product over and over!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this primer.  It goes on weightless and smooth.  My makeup lasts all day with it on.  I love the gold flecks that give my skin that extra glow, even though it's more on the subtle side.  My skin is dry and sensitive and I find I have no bad reaction to this product at all.
worth every penny. My markup goes on like a dream and gives me such an amazing glow. Will definitely repurchase!!! Love love love!
ridiculous results, would pay way more than 75 for this. great on every skin type and age. on my 4th bottle!

This WORKS! I don't know how but in 47 and the glow that it gives to your skin and makeup is AMAZING.  I work in a salon with lights n dryers and it HOLDS my makeup all day!!!! Put your foundation immediately after this like it says when its a bit sticky and it will be awesome.  I've tried so many glow primers but I wish i tried this sooner when I saw Tati rave about it.

Not only do I feel so luxurious when I use this (mainly for special events) but when I do it takes about double the power to remove it because it's basically glued to my face. No matter what foundation I use with this my makeup looks so fresh and beautiful all day! Definitely will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product as a 100 point gift from Sephora. Not a fan of this product, found that it made my face look really greasy/shiny and caused my make-up to separate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product glides onto my skin so smoothly, and the fresh feeling it leaves as it dries is a little pick me up before I apply the rest of my face. And plus, who doesn't want to feel like a million bucks using a primer with actual gold flecks in it?

OMG this stuff is magic in a bottle! Doesn't matter what foundation I use, it turns into an amazing makeup day. By itself it doesn't tighten skin or blur imperfections, but it makes any foundation blend on so seemlessly! I've tried it with sheer liquids, heavy creams, and powder foundations, and it always turns out perfectly (even with foundations that I dislike by themselves). I have super combo skin (oily tzone, dry flaky patches, acne, and fine lines) and this stuff makes my makeup look so smooth and perfect, really gives the illusion that I've got much better skin. It's expensive, but one tiny little dab goes a long way. Worth every penny!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant in purchasing this due to the price tag... I'm very happy I gave in and tried it. Every time I use this primer my makeup goes on beautifully and looks great. I definitely notice some firming (I'm almost 40 and fighting it). I have normal skin with a little oil in my t-zone. I usually wear makeup for 9 or more hours at work and this keeps it lasting and looking good all day. Try it you won't be disappointed you did.

I had bought this product out on a whim because I was intrigued by the 24K gold particles, and I'm so glad I did!  I have acne prone, oily skin, which means I have to be careful of what I put on my face or else it'd cause me to break out. Using this primer I've noticed my acne has subsided, my face calms down(assuming because of the gold) and pores look minimized!  The primer has a lightweight consistency but does an amazing job. My face doesn't look caked and it holds onto the make up really well. It also helps that it smells amazing! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a fan of the other face primer (by the fellow that loved Morroco) but I like this one so much more!It feels clean and fresh going on, and doesn't have the unpleasantly slick silicone feel of the other. Don't be afraid of the glitter, it melds into the skin and doesn't shine like a 12 year old at her first dance.....I will certainly buy the full size when this sample runs out.
I love this product,I've gotten so many compliments ..I'm on my second bottle!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've wanted to try this primer for a while and I'm so happy I finally did! The texture is so different from any primer I've used- it almost feels like hand sanitizer when it comes out of the bottle, which was a huge shock to me. A little goes a long way, one small pump covered my entire face! I was skeptical about how well it would work on my skin, but as soon as it started sinking in I saw a noticeable difference in the tightness and texture of my skin- and then after putting on my foundation, I was in LOVE. It's like it made my pores disappear! The texture of the product is sightly tacky after application and my skin felt moisturized, tight and healthy. Foundation went on amazing! I can't stop looking at my face. I have just about a million different primers but this has to be my favorite. Money well spent!

I've tried so many primers and nothing compares to this one, yes it's pricey but so worth every penny. I have dry skin and it makes my skin feel so refreshed, my foundation goes on so smooth and flawless. I will buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is amazing.  Its thin and lightweight yet it holds down your makeup like glue, but without the tackiness.  It gives such a flawless application to my makeup without streaking or caking.  I can apply many layers plus concealer, highlighter, and contour and not one of those layers with cake or smudge throughout the day be it summer or winter.  This primer is thin, almost feels as thin as hand sanitizer and it absorbs very quickly and leaves your skin soft and plump.  The gold flakes in the primer give your skin this glow that reflects light.  It makes your skin seem healthy and radiant even on my most tired days when I spent the previous night up with the baby. The follow-up with setting spray gives my makeup a little bit of an oompf.  Because this is a little pricey, I save this for special occasions out where I want my makeup to be flawless whether Iu2019m laughing or crying for that matter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw Tati review this and had to try it, and I was totally hesitant because of the price.  However, I'm soooo happy I ordered it!  I absolutely feel the firming effects of this primer and it makes my make-up last ALL DAY LONG!  I think the gold flecks are cool (I think they are for firming), but it really has made a difference in how smooth my make-up goes on, making old acne scars and pores much less visible, which is a BIG WIN for me!  I haven't had any problem with it breaking me out yet (I've been using it for about two weeks), and it does have a stronger fragrance, but it smells luxurious to me, so I don't mind it.  I definitely recommend it, for both the firming and priming abilities that it has!  It is pricey...but so worth it, in my opinion!

I have dry skin and this primer worked well in smoothing the flakiness I had. However not so moisturizing. The scent is nice not overpowering. And the film it leaves gives a slight tacky residue making it great for makeup application. I find for the price it didn't do anything spectacular that other primers for a cheaper price did. And it didn't deliver any luminosity/ radiance that it supposedly says it does. I took 2 stars off: one for the price and one for not delivering radiance. I love the packaging and how pretty and luxurious the gold specks were, but I returned this product cause it just didn't seem worth it. I went back to my other primers.

This wasn't my favorite. I think this might be the first product I return :/ I bought it after seeing a review and the bloggers love for this product. Not worth the price. Much better primers out there for less for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I saw a YouTuber who loves it for it's firming effect. It's described as a radiance concentrate for the face and I don't get that as much as I get the firming/lifting, however it does have a moisturizing cooling feel that I really like. It's moisturizing enough that some days I don't need a moisturizer before I prime, just go straight in with this.  I got this during the VIB rouge sale and I don't think I would buy this again until the sale just because it's ridiculously expensive, but when the sale comes around again I will get another one because it's really good!!

It is lightweight, makes my skin looks radiance, youthful and plumped. I also cannot detect the gold once I put it on my face. Downside are it only entend any of my foundation about 5-6 hours and it has a strong fragrance which I am okay with.
This primer is a pretty big disappointment. It's texture is very watery which I actually like but it doesn't seem to do much. Doesn't increase longevity or change the finish of your makeup.

reviews.review_title: Oh my word! it actually works
reviews.review_text: So I saw my fav YouTube try this and I had to have it. I have a very picky t zone and pretty dry everywhere else. I am writing this after the first try. I put my make up on about 10 hours ago. Normally after about 6 I'm pretty oily. I am not oily AT ALL. I looked in the mirror and actually gasped. I have people ask me at the end of the day if I feel ok because I'm so oily and run down and gross. But today was amazing. I can't wait to try day 2. So far a super must purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I hate to say this, because I wanted to LOVE this product, but it did not work for me. I have extremely sensitive skin that is also acne prone. This product has too much fragrance for me (bugged me all day) and it broke out my skin, so I had to return it. Overall, I also don't find it to be a good primer compared to the many others I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Even tho there a flecks of gold throughout this primer, you can not detect them once you have applied it. I find the texture of this primer dries slightly tacky....which is wonderful for holding your foundation in place for longer. It's definitely scented, so if you are scent sensitive be aware, this may irritate you. Once the primer is dry, and a little really does go a very long way, it's soft to the touch. The over all finish, before foundation application, is a smoothed, healthy plumped up look. I can see anyone who already has great skin being able to wear this under BB creams, or just on its own. It's very fresh, and illuminating, but not pinky toned like its counter part, Meteorites Perles, this primer is clear.  I think it gives the illusion of lifting the skin at the start, but hopefully in time it will benefit my skin w use. It's very different from other primers I have tried...I like the gel consistency....I have normal to dry skin and am not prone to break outs.  I am loving how this is blurring my expression lines! Very impressed!  Worth the splurge....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fast absorbing, light weight, it smoothed out my skin and helped the foundation to glid on more easily and evenly.  Another thing I noticed is it's lifting power, at first I couldn't believe it; I primed half of my face with this first and I can see within seconds the side with it was slimmer and higher than the other. I have no idea about the sicence behind it other than that gold does have a temporary lifting power, but it's truely amazing.  Also, my makeup stayed on for the entire day, all I need was some light blotting and everything held on so well. I couldn't think of cons other than it's so expensive. But a little goes a long way so I think it's totally worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Being so expensive  I struggIed to purchase this.  Wish I hadn't  because  it is PERFECTION.  It has subtIe tightening  quaIities  and   Iove it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Guerlain has a lot of amazing primers but this one is by far the best, I have had it for several months and I noticed how much smoother and tighter my skin has been looking. Honestly worth every penny, a little goes a long way

reviews.review_title: goes well with a lot of foundations
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous primer. Very luminous. Not oily. It trully tightens the skin. It doesn't go well with the dooey foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG IT WORKS VERY WELL ON MY SKIN. DEFINITELY WORTH A TRY.
Got turned on to this from Tati (Glamlife Guru) and she is right on the money. This stuff is youth in a bottle

I ordered this from Sephora, thinking it was a special for Sephora packaged size. Sadly, it is not. Sephora needs to make sure they adhere to truth in advertising standards. That said, this is a fantastic product. Check out the review by Tati on YouTube.

I bought this product due to Tati review. This changed my makeup game! Holy grail! Plumps. Firms. Just makes your face perfect for foundation. I have horrible combination skin. Breakout easily. No breakouts with this product! I suggest using a light moisturizer before this (for dry skin or patches) then Lastly I'll go in with tarte slate primer in needed areas. It truly gives you Barbie doll skin! I almost swear my skin has seriously improved!

I don't write too many reviews...but I had to for this product. I haven't had it a wicked long time-maybe 2 weeks or a little more-so I can't say it will do anything for your skin over time (I don't believe it claims to, but ya never know). What I do know is that this product has completely changed how my makeup looks. Prior to this product I had great makeup says, good makeup days and bad makeup days. Every day so far my makeup has been absolutely flawless. It seriously just looks like skin. It doesn't matter what foundation I'm using, concealer (although the new Make Up For Ever concealer is amazing as well!), powder, etc. I am just blown away by this product. I was scared about the price tag at first, but I am devoted to this product now and I can safely say this is totally worth the price. I never knew my makeup could look this amazing and I 100% owe it to this product. You can feel it working-it tightens your skin in a very hydrating, baby smooth way. My face just feels so soft and looks wonderful even with this by itself. Great job Geirlain!!!!

I've never had a better makeup day then when I wear this primer. I feel flawless and my foundation seems to stay in place all day! When you first apply it it smells and feels luxiourous- for the price it should! I don't really see firming but I still love the product and would re-purchase it. I have oily skin for reference.

I wanted to try it because it had such a high hype- but it's just alright. people swear they see a difference in firmness but I don't. it's not very illuminating (Diors primer is better in that regard), but it is light and preps the skin alright. wouldn't buy again.

I tried a sample of it and loved it. It lifts and firms your skin, it primes it and your makeup looks flawless and your skin feels super soft. It does have a heavy smell but I don't mind it. I feel like it does everything it promises it will. I bought the full size using a gift card (partially) as this was the only way I felt I could really justify buying a primer that costs so much. I don't know if I would repurchase with my own hard earned cash in the future. I do love it though (star docked for crazy price tag). PLEASE NOTE* the gold isn't meant to make your face shimmer! I am seeing low ratings based on this. If you want a shimmer primer look elsewhere like Becca.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after seeing a few Youtubers try it out and I honestly think it's worth every penny at this point (I've been using it for about a week now). I have oily skin but I don't notice any shininess until after about 8 hours of having my makeup on and it really does seem to keep my makeup looking fresh for longer than most primers. And even with the oil starting to peek through later on in the day, it's still not the oil slick that I'm used to seeing. While I don't feel any tingling sensation after applying it like others have experienced it really does seem to lift my face and make my makeup go on smoother. I still use Benefit Porefessional, however, to fill in my large pore areas. I love how my makeup looks throughout the day when using this and, at this point, I would definitely re-purchase!

Wow. This primer is magic. It really lifts and smoothes. It only lasts until you remove it, but it does work wonders. My foundation applies very nicely and stays a bit longer too. My pores also are remarkably invisible. Love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend of mine had bought this and said it was amazing so I had to get her to let me use some. WOW! The results from using this were so apparent and amazing! I don't really have much of anything that would require me to get skin products to firm up my skin, but this plumped and firmed my skin! Now (and I saw a few reviewers confuse this) the gold is not there to illuminate the skin as it is the thing that firms up the skin which it definitely did! Plus a little goes a long way! Only downside to this is the price. As much as I love it I just cannot get myself to buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and enjoyed using it a few times. You only need a small amount which is great! It was very soft and made my skin smooth with a little glow. That being said, I don't know that I'd spend $74 on a primer, even this one. If you're willing to spend the money, you won't be disappointed.

Sadly, this just doesn't do it for me. It feels nice- like aloe Vera on my face. The gold does not show up on me at all. I'm very fair skinned. I found the price tag too high to keep when it worked more like aloe to me. Returned :-(

I have a sample of this. I like what it does for me. I tried this on one side of my face to compare. I had no makeup on & my skin was dry & patchy. 2 tiny dots covered the whole half. It moisturized & made my skin look dewy. It was so soft! Not tacky. It also illuminates. I like this for the summer as an alternative to heavy moisturizing cream. Maybe the less you use & the more you rub it in, it'll work better. Worked for me! The smell was pretty & I caught whiffs when I'd turn my head. It didn't irritate at all. It was a light scent. Now, the not so good.....It slightly tightened. It didn't fill a lot of my fine lines. It also didn't make my pores look smaller. I can buy a product for my pores, that's ok. This little sample lasts over 6 months, so you'll have your bottle forever. Hence, the price. I'll buy a full size bottle gladly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always repurchase this. Great for dry/dehydrated/sensitive skin. Works well under any foundations (7?8?) I've tried. No color correction, just letting you know. Doesn't feel too sticky or heavy at all.
This stuff looks beautiful over moisturizer and under a light layer of foundation. Adds a nice sheen to skin and the amount in the package lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight, yes. Fast-absorbing, yes. Coverage? Not really. Forget about the 24K gold part, it's really just a marketing strategy. Overall I like the texture of this product and how lightweight and easy apply it is. Keep buying it when I finish this bottle? Probably not.
I absolutely in love with this product! Skin become very smooth and even! So glad I got ths! Look changing...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: its really comfortable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My husband gave me this product a few day ago and I've been using it to test. I tried all-day makeup, night makeup, no-makeup look, etc. And I also tried, one day, using it only in half of my face. I have oily skin and saw some comments about it not being good for oily skin, but I didn't have this problem. My makeup (with YSL Le Teint Touche u00c9clat) lasted about 7-8 hours. For the q/2 face day, it was the same as without the primer, so it doesn't improve the lasting effect of the foundation. However, the application of both foundation and concealer was slightly smoother, almost without need for buffering foundation in the end. Besides that, I noticed a subtle golden glow in my (light) skin. I thought it could be biased b/c I know about the product, so in the 1/2-face day, I asked my husband how was my makeup and he said good, but this side is different. Do you have two looks? I prefer this one.... It was the side with the primer.  Take into consideration I wear little foundation and almost never apply powder to set my makeup. I have oily skin and think powder, although helps to make the look last longer, can get cakey AND sometimes has the white-powder look in photos. So I try to avoid it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely retains moisture - perfect for dry skin!  A little bit on the expensive side, but if you are willing to splurge, definitely do! Guerlain's products are amazing, just priced in the luxury side of the spectrum.  This primer reminds me of the Limited Edition 2012 Holiday Guerlain Liu Gold Spray, and I absolutely love it.  Based off of sheer price alone, wouldn't buy again.  But if you're the type of person that doesn't need to do a FULL FACE makeup, this is definitely for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: amazing primer but to expensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't waste your money with this, besides adding a few gold specks to your face, it does nothing else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING! It leaves this golden glow, and makes your skin radiant! It also smooths/evens out the skintones and diminishes pores. Unfortunately I can't use this product because it's not great for oily/combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product! A little,goes a long way and does an amazing job or improving the appearance of your foundation ! I have aging oily skin and this is the best of the primer type products I have ever tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly The product looks beautiful, although it really doesn't do much. Or At least I can't tell. It feels like water with gold specks nothing special. Not worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I deviated from my usual primer with this product and regretted it heartily. Two facials later I am STILL not clear of the clogging in my pores. In fairness, for a portion of the time I was also trying a new moisturizer but even after I dropped that from my routine the issue persisted. Returned this product and went back to old routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried this I really did see a difference, there was a subtle glow to my skin (very subtle) and it seemed to blur pores better than Benefit Porefessional. But I think the final result depends on what foundation is used, and perhaps what moisturizer as well. Some days I'm not thrilled with it but some days it looks great. I'll keep it but I wouldn't buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to use with Guerlain foundation (which nothing compares to) and I have to say that I have not noticed a difference whether I use it or not.  I think it is a nice idea, I love the brand and most of the products are amazing but I could not justify purchasing this again.  If you do decide to purchase it what I would recommend is applying your foundation as soon as possibly after applying this product (do not let it dry).  Also, I found it does not work to prime your face and minimize wrinkles in what you might expect from a regular makeup 'base' or 'primer'. It is very lightweight and almost watery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for some time and compared to others that I own this just doesn't stand up. It doesn't do anything for my complexion or work well as a primer. I feel I wasted my money on this one.

I have been using this make-up base of little over a week and haven't noticed any significant changes with my oily t-zone. It does mate me out for about 5 hours, then I have to retouch with powder. It smells amazing but I don't think I will be purchasing it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does make my T-Zone oily after half a day, but pro is the primer does not contain silcon, thus no risk of break out. Also has those lovely gold shimmers in it, not a bad thing to open up a new day :) and will buy it again.

reviews.review_title: Not my HG primer but it will do for now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried countless primers of all prices and lines. I like (not LOVE) this primer. It is another step in my continuing, seemingly endless journey to find a HG primer. I don't know whether the gold ingredient does a thing for my skin but the base does provide a terrific canvas for application of my liquid foundation. It's difficult to describe, but when applied and allowed to dry for a bit, it feels a bit tacky...don't be put off by this description, however. It holds my foundation (which I finish with powder) for my 12-hour work day (as long as I remember not to touch my face with my hands). I've used it with Guerlain Parure D'Lumiere foundation as well as my go to daily foundation, Giorgio Armani Lasting Silk. The two foundations are quite different in consistency (Armani being much thinner and almost watery in comparison to the Guerlain foundation), but the L'or base keeps both foundations from slipping or disappearing. I also find that it has made it easier to apply my Armani Lasting Silk foundation evenly (and I use my fingers to do this despite having tons of available brushes). I use two pumps of product to cover my entire face and lower chin line so the product quantity in this package will last quite a long time. For those of you who are all about the packaging, you won't be disappointed; it's classic Guerlain...lovely and heavy glass...lots of class. I'm more impressed by functional packaging. Having said this, the pump on this bottle works flawlessly so far; I don't know how it'll function when I'm reaching the end of the product inside. I actually bought my bottle at full price and recently purchased a second bottle because the L'or does do its job well, but II would only buy it a reasonable sale price, such as a VIB 20% discount sale. So I guess you can say that I'm happy with it but not deliriously so....I'm still hoping to find something that's a HG primer for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very luxurious, moisturizing, great for dry skin, has a pleasant smell. Creates a smooth surface to put foundation on. I have dry patches on my face and they are easily visible under foundation. I got this product hoping to cover them and it worked great for me. I used it over a moisturizer and got a very smooth result with no visible dry patches. Would recommend to someone with the same problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the primer but I found too liquid consistency and too much perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: From some of the reviews, I was expecting some dramatic difference in my face, either just using this or with makeup over it. It's okay, but there was no noticeable difference. It is important to put makeup on while it's still wet. I will finish the bottle, but I won't purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want a flawless canvas on which to apply your foundation, buy this. It feels luxurious. My only qualm is that it costs $70.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it does feel pretty wet so oily skin may not like this but for combo and especially dry skin this is awsome. My favorite way to use this is with my powder foundation, it gives the powder something to stick on to and smooths it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i'm in love with this primer. It gives me a beautiful glow my foundation never looked better when i put this under it's fast absorbing and it smells heavenly! My complexion in photos look so silk and smooth i would really recommend to use it with Make Up For Ever HD Foundation !

I think this is one of the best bases I've ever tried. My makeup stays on all day even with sweat and exercise. Also the gold helped improve my skin texture and the base itself acts as a slight moisturizer. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this gold base concentration is best used as a primer. it's too bad that i had to put foundation on top of it, because it made my skin look absolutely stunning. just for your information, i am more or less naturally tanned, so the gold really finished off nicely on my overall complexion. i purchased this wish sephoras favorites of summer 2012. i am not able to afford the full size product, however, it's probably one of my favorite products ever. i own the meteorites also by guerlain, but this product tops all others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't used this is a while, and I was going through my things and found it.  I really liked this product, it added a luminous glow without being shimmery. It's also soothing and hydrating, as I have dry skin, and it worked very well at evening out my skintone. It doesn't do anything special really.  This works well, however I don't think that it's worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blasts any base I have used out of the ballpark. I was shocked how awesome it was. I have dry skin with fine lines and I bought this as a splurge and it was well worth it. It leaves a dewy glow (I like the 'glowy' look when it comes to the products that I use) and it absorbs quickly. I find that you want to apply foundation as fast as possible after putting this on and they 'melt' together to achieve the best results. I set with a light dusting of loose powder and my make up stays put all day. Love it!
Just feels goods! Guides over your skin Luxuries

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i have oily skin i tried this on this morning my skin absorbed it fast(i used it alone) 4 hours later my skin is STICKY AND OILY!!!! EWWWWW!!!! but it did make my skin glow but im soooo sad that it made my skin feel sticky and oily :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let's be honest, I bought this because it looked gorgeous and though I didn't expect anything magical, I expected a decent primer. This is not it. I used this under the Guerlain Lingerie de Peau and honestly, it looked better without it. It's like the foundation was running away from my skin with this as a base (and I have dry/normal skin). My skin wasn't illuminated, it was wet. When it dried, it looked like nothing. It looked like nothing; it felt like nothing. I bought this for its beauty (and who doesn't love a primer); I returned it because not even that was worth the price.

This is the BEST make-up base. I have tried many others before using this product, and received many samples of alternative make-up bases, even purchased other make-up bases when I FORGOT my make-up bag one time, and also when my LUGGAGE/MAKE-UP POUCH WAS TEMPORARILY LOST... Don't waste your money of cheaper brands, new products, etc. etc. You get what you pay for!!! And, L'OR Radiance is the best one out there, not to mention it lasts for months and months. So, think about it!!! WE ARE WORTH IT!!

Bought this online afyer reading some of the reviews and I love it!! Didn't fully realize it was a foundation primer but I've used it by itself and it really does illuminize the skin! Yoi do have to apply it quickly because its very thin and the gold flakes don't always blend or dissolve quickly so you do have to make sure it's on there well or you will have gold sparkles on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am using baremineral powder for foundation, so I thought it might not work as well as using liquid foundation. But I was WRONG. The foundation stayed all day long, and it made my face GLOW! Not oily, but a radiant feel. I will definitely buy again! It smell very good too! Very happy~~~

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this goes on nicely,absorbs quick and really evens out my skin tone! Makes my complexion GLOW without looking glittery! I use this all by itself when I don't feel like putting makeup on. I use it under makeup , over makeup, BLENDED with my makeup up. Love Love Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample in a SF kit. I have to say it does make your skin have a glow. I have been using it for a couple weeks, and a little goes a long way. The price lead me to take a star off, but other than that if you are looking for a super luxe primer this is the one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so fun to use. I love that it makes my skin glow from within and keeps my make up set all day.  The product is very lightweight and absorbs quickly after application. It is kind of tricky in that way, because you feel that you need to apply more. But it isn't necessary. Your skin truly glows and it enhances a tan. I feel that it evens out my skintone as well.  The scent is perfumed and not fresh. This may bother some, but it doesn't bother myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It is very light and makes my skin feel very soft and smooth. I like that is absorbs quickly and doesn't fell heavy like other primers tend to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This primer is ideal for dry or mature skin. One pump locks in moisture and seals the skin before applying foundation. I like the Parure Extreme but I have also used this with Lingerie D'Peau. This primer is used sparingly and lasts a long time. My sensitive skin just loves it,
If it wasn't for the price, I would bathe in this primer. You glow without any oiliness. Worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: smell good and super moisturizing. really need it for winter!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this product on a complete whim and I am SO HAPPY that I did! With just two little drops it covers my complete face evenly. I apply my powder foundation immediately after it dries and my make up turns out looking airbrushed! I've gotten tons of compliments while using this product. I even use this without following with make up; it gives my face a natural glow. AMAZING!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've had my eye on this for a really long time. It seem so decadent and indulgent to have a primer with gold in it. All schmancy and sophisticated. And also super expensive. I finally got a sample of it in onthe of the summer samplers boxed set. I was so disappointed. It so thin and runny. The gold flakes didn't make any difference. There was no radiance or brightness. Nothing. And it wasn't that great at keeping my makeup in place either. On me, this was nothing more than a novelty. Check me out being like Paris Hilton with my gold primer! and that's about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: $$$$ but a pretty good primer especially if you use other Guerlain facial cosmetics

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Reviewers who say this product does nothing either have skin that is beyond help or they need glasses. This doesn't do the job of filling in fine lines that it claims to do, but it does seem to smooth the look of large pores and it leaves the skin with a lovely, soft glow without a lot of shimmer. It doesn't make liquid foundation hard to blend the way some primers do. It's pricey, but it will last forever - three small drops is enough to cover the whole face. I like it.

reviews.review_title: Expensive, but definitely a great product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I actually received a sample of this primer and haven't actually bought it yet, but I have to say that it is fantastic! I never actually used a primer until about a year ago, and since then have tried many of them, but aside from increasing the longevity of my foundation by a bit, I've never seen any dire need for them. Add that to the fact that I'm a long-time acne sufferer, and the thought of putting yet more product on my skin was not a welcome one. Still, I found a primer and have been using it every day, and was never 100% thrilled; and then I tried this product. The difference is amazing! There is a marked change in the luminosity of my skin before I put on foundation (yes, even after the primer is dry) and when I apply concealer and foundation, it provides an amazingly smooth surface, even with my Smashbox Halo Powder Foundation; plus, it increases its staying power for the entire day. And it definitely creates that glow from the inside that all the beauty junkies rave about. To cut this before I ramble on too long, I love it, and although the price is pretty hefty for a primer, I'll probably grab a full-size once my sample is gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received a deluxe sample of this in the summer set I purchased, and it is definitely worth skipping, especially for the price! It is very smooth, lightweight, and it does help to firm/tighten skin, but I found it to be very sticky. I have sensitive skin, and this product seemed to irritate it- just a bit. It also has a light scent that bothered me, and I ended up having to remove my makeup and re-apply (I am very sensitive to scents, especially when they are around my face).  I just feel that value wise- you can find something so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Sure, it makes me look a bit dewy, but so does nearly any serum-type base. I used this one day and my normal primer the next, and to be honest, saw no difference. It's not cooling at all, so I'm not sure where they came up with that.  It's by no means bad, but not at all worth the price to me. My normal moisterizer + primer works just as well, and for the price of Guerlain's serum, I could buy 2 years supply of my primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Guerlain's L'or Radiance Concentrate With Pure Gold Make-up Base helps my skin to look super smooth and perhaps slightly tighter, but it doesn't seem to do much more than that. I was looking forward to trying it, but was highly disappointed that it didn't provide more. It's not a bad product by any means. It's just that others do the same thing, and more, for less money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It say cooling but it's not ewactly cooling. (unless you store it in the fridge?). Other than that this product is amazing! It goes on like a serum and the little flecks of gold just smooth onto the skin leaving it beautifully radiant, soft, and dewy. I had been looking for a product to make my skin look glowing and dewy without being too sparkly or too greasy. This does just that and gives a flawless base for any foundation. I ABSOLUTELY recommend it for anyone with dull skin. It is really pricey but it is worth it. Try it in the sephora store before you buy it if you're unsure. I hope you love it and buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love Guerlain's products, but this one is definitely not worth the cost. Something in it really irritated my sensitive skin.....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really wanted this product to be fabulous, but it is not. It doesn't do anything. The only reason we find this product luxurious is because we want to give ourselves a reason why we just spent $70 for a gel primer...
