reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this under the Mu00e9tu00e9orites foundation and over Dior's 60/80 cream. This combination leaves my face looking dewy, even toned and bright. This product does a great job of setting my makeup for the rest of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: A bit pricey. I first used it under my NARS powder foundation-the result was a Dewey glow without being shiny. I also tried it with Dior Invisible. The result was perfect skin that looked like I had no make-up on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Normally Guerlain products live up to their product claims for me. I have the Meteorites Makeup Base and love it which is why I wanted to try this one. I did not get the radiance I wanted from it.

reviews.review_title: Keeps my makeup on all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am new to the Guerlain brand, and I wanted the full experience. So I purchased the L'or Radiance Concentrate With Pure Gold Make-up Base primer, the Parure Extreme Luminous Extreme Wear Foundation, and Mu00e9tu00e9orites Powder. I like for my make to work together, and this does. In the beginning I was really on the fence about the L'or Radiance Primer. First of all, when I received it, I think it may have been opened. The package was open in the boxu2026.I didnu2019t like that. Second, I am used to primers being a little oily or greasy to aid smooth application of the foundation. This didnu2019t do that. It wasnu2019t oily or greasy and I didnu2019t feel it helped my foundation go on. Only one or two flakes of gold came outu2026.and they just sat on my face, looking like lonely glitter. I was pretty set on sending it back. Though with all three products my face did look great, and lasted all day! I am one of those girls who at night when I wash my face, I get off some eye makeup, but my foundation had disappeared hours ago. But was this the foundation or the primeru2026maybe the powder? Which of these made my makeup stay on all day? So I did an experiment, I used my makeup just as the day before, and skipped the primer. At the end of the day, my makeup was gone. This makes the product worth its weight in gold. I am keeping it. I love that I can go somewhere after work and not worry about reapplying makeup. I think it is a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: set your skin smooth and last all day under foundation. it's better on dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just purchased and tried right away. I'm normal to dry. Works great with my skin. Smells fantastic.My skin is soft and supple. Makes my current foundation look so much better. I'm sold and will definitely buy again. Worth its weight in gold!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Apparently, it's $70.00 + tax. ;) However, Guerlain's L'or Radiance Concentrate With Pure Gold Make - Up Base is definitely worth the money. I've read a ton of reviews that rave about this product but, complain about the price. I understand that $70.00 is not a small sum of money however, this IS a Guerlain product. Most, if not all, of their products are pricey... It comes with the name.  With that said... On to the review:  The consistency of this product is very similar to that of a skincare serum. It's gel - like properties make it a dream to apply however, it is a tad bit runny so work fast. It absorbs relatively quickly and one pump is enough to cover the whole face. It smells of violets (which is Guerlain's signature cosmetics scent) but, quickly fades in about 5 - 10 minutes after initial application. It leaves a noticeable glow on the skin, even under heavy foundation. As for the 24 - carat gold flakes?! Well, they're made of finely milled particles that mix together with the gel when pumped. It also tightens the skin, so that large pores become less visible, without drying it out.  Side note: I'm in my early 20's so, I can't say much about fine lines and wrinkles. Sorry. =(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I don't mind spending money on something expensive if the product delivers. I got this in a sample size and loved it so I will def be purchasing a full size. I have very oily and problematic skin and never liked any of the primers I came upon. They all seemed to leave my skin more greasier and pores and scars more exaggerated. I swore off primers but when I saw that this is made with pure gold the leo in me had to try it! It has a gel like consistency (a little runny) and you can't actually see the gold when you apply it on your face. It does leave your face looking glowing and dewy and seems to have a slight tightening effect. It does not contribute to the oiliness either, actually it seems that it helps keep it at bay. Well done Guerlain!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I read reviewes and thought will give it a try . However, this product does not do anything for a skin , as a primer , skin softener or anything else. I am so surprised to that for a price of $70 you get basically nothing at all. The gold staff in it I had to double check all over my face cause sometimes it stays and sparkle like a haloween make up . Very dissapointed with the product benefits and price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I so wanted to love this product. The scent is positively divine, and you feel so pampered putting it on. However, whenever I use it I get tiny white bumps on my forehead, which is odd because the texture isn't heavy or greasy at all. Guess my skin just doesn't care for it. Gave it to my mom who has drier skin than I do and she loves it.

reviews.review_title: Good Product Not Sure its Worth the Price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Like all Guerlain products you feel pampered with luxury while using the product, but the price is a bit excessive for what it delivers. If I am spending 70 on a primer it better be great and not just good. Like a lot of the other fair skinned users it was tough to see the benefit of the gold flecks. I do like the sent and it is a great lightweight base for make-up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: it is a good product to use as a serum before you apply your primer....it smells so good and really hydrate my skin...i can not live without this great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: the product is amazing, gives a very visible but subtle glow to the face, the only down point is the price, I would be much happy if the price tag on that will be around the $50 ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It is expensive, but I love this primer. Makeup stays put, skin looks glowing, and I feel like my makeup looks so much better in pics with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I WOULD HAVE GIVIN IT FIVE STAR BUT THE PRICE IS OVER THE TOP. MATTERFACT WHEN I PURCHASED IT, I PAID WITH A GIFT CARD AND WASNT AWARE OF THE PRICE UNTIL I WENT ONLINE AND SAW THE PRICE. BUT EVER SINCE I HAVE BEEN USING THE PRIMER MY FACE LOOK GLOWLY, MATTERFACT I DONT EVER WEAR MAKE-UP ANYMORE. IT DOES EVEN MY SKIN TONE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i cannot say this is the best product i have ever tried, i am not raving about it but i can say it is true to its radiance claim. it does look natural, soft and the little gold specks literally melt onto your skin leaving it fresh and glowy. it does help to keep make up for longer and you can even try it on its own, without foundation for a super smooth finish, with little to no coverage. it does retain moisture, it is extremely light, almost like putting tonic on your skin but slightly denser which feels really nice, but somehow is just not perfect. will use it sometimes, to go out or in the winter. i have tons of primers and use them according to the weather and the fonudation i am wearing. guerlain always makes you feel so luxurious and this is no expection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I would use this everyday but for the price. It is that good - takes years off and makes my skin luminous. My foundation goes on like silk after applying.. I'm so glad I read aboutit from a reviewer reviewing Guerlain's eye shadows and commented that her makeup artist used this prior to her foundation. Love, love, love, it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: my face are mostly wrinkled and dry skin types..but using this base foundation..my make last longer and no cakey...i love this product..keep my make up last longer and smooth finish...^0^ my face smooth and glow like satin...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I did a lot of reaserch on this item, because the price is much higher than any other similar products. However, I'm a big fan of this brand. If you like heavy makeup, it's not a good chice. It makes you looks perfect, but it's not very dark or shiny product, just looks natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: When I walked into the store I already had make up on. I tried this on top of my make up to see was it worth the price. I still made no purchase, I did notice that my skin looked allot more hydrated. When I got out to my car I took a look in the mirror and ran back in to purchase, it is wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: love, love love, it feels amazing!!! left my skin looking dewy and fresh.I applied with a foundation brush itu00b4s perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Does make makeup slide on easier...it may give you a bit of glow but not as much as is claimed...If you have dry skin like I do, this does help with a dewy look and I have not had to touch up my make up during the day. Let it dry well before you apply base foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Total waste of money... I didn't noticed any changes...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: great primer, very lightweight, absorbs fast. Love the gold flakes, those were the reason I got it. The gold flakes disappear, but still made me feel like a princess:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've not really been impressed with this product - it is expensive, and my makeup does not seem to apply more smoothly when I wear it. I've tried wearing it alone, and it does nothing for my skin. However, I do notice that it helps my sunscreen apply more smoothly (no pilling or caking).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for a long time and of course, I really like it - I'm a yellow based skin tone, and this brightens me up plus makes my makeup base go on more smoothly - I really dislike the new container though - Heavy and breakable

reviews.review_title: Just because it didn't work for YOU
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: doesn't mean that it won't work for others out of 8 reviews only 3 were >2 stars I bought it and it worked great! Don't tell people to not purchase something simply because it didn't work in your favor. I give it 4 stars or whirly things whatever those things are.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: As another reviewer pointed out, the consistency of this product is wonderful! It's very light weight, and non-greasy. It spreads very evenly so a little goes a long way. It does not make my skin break out. I don't really know if the gold flecks do anything- I haven't noticed my skin becoming more radiant. But I will repurchase this just for it's texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the consistency of this primer. It doesn't leave my face feeling like an oil slick like some other ones out there. The gold flecks are just marketing. They look great in the bottle, but you won't be seeing any of it once it hits your face. I've been using this for over a year now with no breakouts. Definitely my holy grail when it comes to primer/makeup bases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Guerlain's gold makeup base did nothing for me. I tried it several different ways...applying more, applying less, mixing with foundation...nothing worked. Returned it.

reviews.review_title: light, makes face look fresh and radiant
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: either alone or under makeup, skin looks fresh, and keeps it this way all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is great for using it before you put make up on. It made my skin subtle and soft lasting all day long. The gold dissapears into the skin as you put it on, but you get the glow that lasts a long time. I loved this product and would buy it again for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I know the illusion of applying gold flecks to your skin is wonderful, but really it did absolutely nothing for me. It was the biggest waste of money I've ever spent on Sephora. I tried it several ways to get it to work- alone, mixed with my moisturizer, mixed with foundation, nothing worked. Save yourself the $60.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's not excellent but not that bad. It doesn't offers radiance as it says and I don't see how the gold thing work, but it smell expensive~if you know what I mean~  To me, it's more like a skincare product. When you just apply it on you don't feel that much change, but, BUT, if you check back your face several hours later (I applied to the left side for a comparison), you will find that the left side is more moist than the right side. I really believe that after a little while I'll be able to see the result of this pricey stuff.
